story:
This game would be defined as a RTS space simulator. Single player with skirmish multiplayer mode.

The idea was at first to create a Homeworld clone, but it grew and became a blend of Homeworld, Elite and maybe a little bit of Sid Meiers Pirates.
You control spaceships in a 3D enviroment. Point and click controls with keyboard shortcuts.
This game is about combat, ship management and modifications, construction, mining and exploration.

The Story

You are for hire. 
You live in a ravaged and a dangerous solar system.
Some centuries ago many solar systems were connected together using wormhole techology. 
Wormhole generators were used to create a wormhole and connect it to the nearest solarsystem. A space ship would go through the wormhole, set up shop and construct a wormhole Stabilizer on the other end, thus connecting the two solar systems. Using this method dozens of solarsystems were connected, explored and settled.
Then everything went to hell. A rapture. The Stabilizers stopped working for some reason. The wormholes became unstable, chaotic and destructive. Each stabilizer became a eye in a storm.
These storms, centered around the stabilizers would send waves of destruction out into the solar systems, disconnecting them from each other and wrecking havoc to everything in them. Waves of destructive energy would sweep the solar systems, gravity would shift at random points, massive energy surges would appear out of nowhere and wormholes would appear at random points in the solar system.
Ships, stations and planets were not safe. Destruction ran rampart. Ships disappeared, stations were ripped apart and planets crumbled under massive gravitational waves. 
But mankind survived. Not everything was destroyed. Stations survived, ships escaped and people lived. People rebuilt and multiplied. Space has become a rough place to live in. 
Destroyed planets are now massive asteroid belts and vast areas are dangerous to travel due to corrosive elements and abnormal space activity.

 

 

Game setting

The game takes place in our Solar system. The Sol system. Earth has been destroyed. Torn apart by massive gravitational forces and spread out in a huge asteroid field. 
People struggle to survive in space stations and colonies. Raiders and pirates operate freely in outskirts of the solar system. Several factions fight for control over resources and lost technology. 
The solar system was fully colonized before the rapture so it's ripe for exploration and rediscovery. Old techological treasures can be found, old caches of minerals await to be opened, and maybe some advanced lost spaceships wait to be awaken. 

What kind of game is this?

  • Its a real time strategy space simulator.
    You manage and command a fleet of ships in real time.

  • Point and click system.
    You use your mouse to issue commands, with keyboard shortcuts.

  • Single Player.
    The game contains a single player storyline. But if enough money is funded I will add a multiplayer to the game, go head to head against another player.

  • Customizable.
    You can customize your ship. Equip your ships with whatever equipment you wish to fit your playstyle.

  • Third person view.
    The game is view from outside of your ships. A commander must have a good overview.

  • Mission driven game.
    Follow the main mission of the game or do the side missions.

 

 

Game Play

Freedom

This game offers the player to explore the solarsystem as he sees fit. Explore asteroid fields or ancient battle sites. Hunt for pirates to claim their bounty, ship mercantile between stations, take on various jobs from companies or factions or raid those ripe merchant ships for their goods.


Command 

Command your fleet on a detailed map. Move freely in 3D space. 
Each ship can be micromanaged. Energy is essential. Boost those weapon systems while draining power from engines or repair systems. Just be sure you dont have to go anywhere in a hurry.
Mine asteroids, raid ships, find forgotten or hidden treasure caches.

 

Customize

Customize your ship with various equipment. Need a fast ship with radar? Remove those energy demanding weapons and install a large radar and add an extra engine. Do your enemies prefer missile systems? Add point defense systems to your ships to destroy those missiles.
 

Combat

Order ships around, target enemies, destroy subsystems. Capture vessels. Destroy the enemy.
The game has a simple AI for each ship. Order a ship to attack another ship and it will do that the best it can. You can also modify how aggressive or passive it is toward enemies.
The game uses area based armor. This means that if armor on one side of your ship is heavily damaged it would be a good idea to swing your ship around.


Interact

This is a active solarsystem. Traders move about, Stations build and sell various goods. Factions fight each other an pirates and raiders make life a little interesting.
You can affect all of this, choose a side to support, watch it grow as other become weakend or destroyed.

The Development Team

Currently its just me, my wife and my friend. I'm Tryggvi Hákonarson. 35 year old. Husband and father. Long time gamer and programmer. Hi!.
My wife, Sólveig árnadóttir, 30 year old, Wife and mother, theologist and writer. Bonjour!
And my friend, Þórarinn Heiðar Harðarson, 35 year old dad, amateur actor, programmer and gamer.

In addition Yagya will provide music for the game.

I have B.S. degree in computer science. I‘ve been developing games in my spare time for about 3-4 years now and I believe that I have enough know how and experience to deliver a complete product.
I grew up playing various computer games. From Elite, Wolfenstein and Homeworld to Assassins Creed, ElderScroll series, Original Fallout games to Fallout 3 and the Xcom series new and original.
Homeworld was and still is one of my favorite games. 

When I started programming games I decided to create a Homeworld clone to master Unity3D. But it grew and became something that I want to see completed.
Its been tough spending most of my free time programming the game so I‘m hoping to raise enough money to work on the game full time.
I want to complete this project. 
I know that I am unknown, I have no reputation, but please judge me by what you see here on this site, the screenshots and the video.


Some people in my life who are programmers or 3D artists have promised to help me with this venture.

What is the status of this project?

This project is about 50-60 percent complete. Most of the heavy lifting in the coding department is done. I've started constructing models for the game and creating the main storyline. I'm missing sound effects and voice acting. I believe I will be able to release the game within one year, so  early next year 2014 or summer 2014.

What will I use the money for?

Survival.
Like most mammals I need food, sleep and warmth. 
My goal $ will let me work fulltime for about 8 months. 
Enough time to finish the game or complete it at least 90%.

Software.
Licence for the Unity3d Pro Game engine and maybe some code (Why reinvent the wheel).

Single player
Create a fun single player experience. Create engaging main story line.

Audio
Buy existing audio or hire someone to create audio for the game.
Voice acting. 

Models and texture
Add more exciting ship designs to the game and beautiful textures.

Optimization
The game demands lots of CPU resources right now. I will try to reduce the demand by optimizing the code.

 

 

Stretch Goals.

25 K Space Station Capture. Setup your own base of operations.
30 K Fleet command. Manage and control multiple fleets on the large game 
40 K Mac and Linux support. Play the game on your Mac or Linux machines.
50 K Expanded gameplay . I will create extra material for the game. Extending the gameplay time.

story:
- " We know that our goal is ambitious, that ambition has meaning, get the best look and gameplay to PLvsM. But even if we do not get that goal, we will not stop working on every detail of the project to get it. Every Euro that is invested, every comment written, and every idea presented here, are respected and valued by us. And they are, and will be essential for this project ... Thanks for your support".


Now commented on Vandal , sincere thanks for your contribution.

   Manin Company is a small software studio with big ideas, for three years we have developed many applications on different platforms (iOS, Android and Windows), focused on the general aspects of industry, we have focused our ability to be continually working, government entities, medical surgery and the development of virtual environments using our augmented reality engine. Applications such as "Mercedes- Benz Comercial Valencia" or "Museum of Valencia Local Police" guarantees our history, large companies have relied on our projects.

   During these three years, we have developed our own technology of virtual reality and augmented reality for mobile devices, this technology (Patent Pending) allows us to locate spaces and virtual elements geo-located with an unseen high quality in augmented reality applications. This technology is capable of representing large amount of virtual elements in scene, without influencing the performance of your mobile device.

   Based on this technology and with a truly enthusiastic and team, we have decided to step higher, we have moved all the development team to what we really like, MAKING VIDEOGAMES!

    PLvsM originated from the idea of ​​being able to experience a RTSG (RealTimeStrategicGaming) in real life, feel the battle, with units being deployed around us. Enjoy a face to face game with a good friend at an open space (public park or garden at our house), or even a stranger on the other side of the world and see what he is seeing. Strategy takes part of this; you could see where the enemy has deployed its units in order to take advantage of the situation, defending or attacking.

   This game type has been with us since computer development started, lets imagination and creativity take part in this. Living this in first person is an exciting experience. Why we should not take a really well known game gender and really feel each new unit we generate, each new construction we build, each new enemy we burrie?

    We desire to create this same experiences on you, on the player, and of course, this experiences need to be highest possible quality. For this, we need your help, having the right amount of investment involves an improvement in all aspects of game development, human resource recruitment, incorporating elements such as better quality modelling, appropriate and original soundtracks or overall higher performance. Even your own ideas could be part of this ambitious project.

The laws of a RTSG have not changed, we all know them, but we want to take those laws ... Out of our locked room.


Test GPS tracking and synchronization.


   Obviously, the battlefield is the real world surrounds you, all kind of attack, defensive, exploration or civilian units would be deployed in your well known environment. The general rules of running a complex RTSG are taken into consideration within PLvsM, but with the added bonus of being able to enjoy all these elements in first person, on your proper skin, around you. Like a true commander in the battlefront.

   Our technology allows us to introduce new elements in the development of the game play, yet impossible to use in a computer desktop game. The real world would affect the game. For example, situating units on top of hills or buildings would give the player an increased field of view because their position is being calculated via GPS (locking its position, longitude, latitude and altitude) the units would be there. The battlefield is observed from a higher position. All of this in order to gain advantage over the enemy.

As a new unit of the battlefield, “You” are the commander and it would make the difference. The game would consider you as a greater threat; enemy units automatically will attack you if they sight you. To defend you in first person, you can build a moving war unit "Mech" and handle it in first person in order to defend you from your immediate attackers, while you are continuously developing a defensive strategy. 

To increase the usage of this unit, will be given to the pilot driving the "mech" will receive a bonus. In combat and from inside this war unit, you can build defences at twice the speed than normal.

    The upgrade system will be one of the most important features in game, all structures and units could be upgraded to take advantage over your opponent. By upgrading structures, you will dispose of special units and characters like the "Spy unit". To achieve this you need a predetermined amount of time and resources. We would implement "in Game" acquisitions, that would boost your performance. For example, you can purchase "Time Boosters" to accelerate the time taken to upgrade structures and units. In advance we can say you that the full upgraded "Mech" will be a truly Killer Machine...


  Real time military strategy game is a game where the user will create infrastructures through construction units, manufacturers to extract resources and military units attack and defend their territory. Including units with special abilities.

   We are aiming to create a new type of game, a game where we can see the best of other games of this genus, including new factors. GPS tracking and other telematic networks.

   It will be based on the GPS movement, so the user can move freely around the battlefield in order to explore and clear the war-fog areas of the unexplored map. We will have 3 main views in game, one on a 2D map where we have a flat representation of the units that we are controlling and also the units that we could visualize of the opponent because of the various in-game methods. The 2nd vision we will have, will be a 3D vision in which we see virtual objects (units or buildings) we have ahead. And finally we have another 3D view in which we will be inside one of the "mech" unts, in wich we will be able to perform certain unique actions.

The main objective of the game is the destruction of enemy command centre. By doing this, the game is over.

  •  Gathering of multiple resources.

   The generation of units would be based on the collection of certain resources that would be spread over the field randomly, also automatically, the engine would know where to place the resources intelligently. For example, if there is a lake, no solid resources like metal would be placed in this lake. We could have two main resources such as gold, oil, metal... (or as many as the development leads us to have). The resources can be extracted by specific unit and when they are extracted, can be deposited on the command centre or on other constructions like warehouses. Once built the command centre, the collector units automatically seek those resources. 

  •  Generating Units :

   Having a game where the vast majority of units will be mechanical (robots, mechs, robotic and motorized vehicles ... )  are going to be generated in a factory. These buildings have in visible areas representative items or icons of their team, with colours.

Infantry units such as heavy or light are generated in specific barracks.

The maximum number of units for one match would be 400, being total of 400/2 per team. The generation of these units will not be linked to specific infrastructure, so from the first minute the player might create as many units as possible. Unit generation would not be instantaneous. User should take this time into consideration.

  • Technologies and improvements:

   Technologies are divided into two sections, one that will be focused on resource issues such as resource gathering speed and harvesting speed etc ... and on the other hand, we have military technologies like armour Improvements, improved damage, range etc... Some  are generic and others might grant ability to units.

  • Exploration of combat map :

   Exploration is carried out in two ways, one, by the moving commander (proper user), or by sending units (exploration or common) to do patrols or sweeps. The first option will only be available as long as both players are playing close to each other because if the separation is greater than 300 meters, it's impossible to move in the area.

The ability to view enemy's camera will be available only when spy units are created and sent to enemy territory.

  • Strategy:

Playing a real time strategy game, involves taking into consideration many factors that may tip the balance one way or another. Should consider the following structure:

           -Coordinate effective resource gathering

           -Generating units with available resources.

           -Chosen game mode (either attacker , aggressive attacker , defender, aggressive defender or balanced)


The units can be arranged on 4 major groups. Within each unit we contemplate different life value, attack, speed, reload speed , rate of fire , shields, etc ..... Units should be compared only within its group.


  1. Mechanical and / or motorized ground units 

  •  "Mechs"

      -Attack Power : Medium

      -Shielding: Average

      -Movement Speed : Average

      -Reload speed : medium

      -Fire rate : High

  •  Tanks

 Light

      -attack power : low

      -shield : low

      -Movement Speed : High

      -Reload speed : medium

      -Fire rate : High

Heavy

      -Attack power: High

      -Shield : High

      -Movement Speed : Low

      -Reload speed : low

      -Fire rate : Low

  2.  Ground units walk

  Assault or heavy:

      -Attack power: Medium

      -Shield : Average

      -Movement Speed : Low

      -Reload speed : Average

      -Fire rate : Low

  Infiltration or light :

      -Attack power: Low

      -Shield : low

      -Movement Speed : Average

      -Reload speed : High

      -Fire rate : High

 3.  Aircrafts

Light

      -Attack power: Low

      -Shield : low

      -Movement Speed : High

      -Reload speed : High

      -Fire rate : High

Heavy

      -Attack power: High

      -Shield : Average

      -Movement Speed : High

      -Reload speed : Average

      -Fire rate : High

 4.  Defence Turrets

     -Against Heavy units

     -Against Air

     -Against Infantry .


The approach of units and buildings for naval battles in areas surrounded by water is one of our objectives, because it really arouse passions such units in a RTSG.

 Our main objective is to create the first real-time strategy game based on GPS locations and augmented reality.

   Developing this type of game is possible thanks to geolocation technology for augmented reality that our team has created and financed from several other products. Other customers have relied on us because we have an ability to perform innovative and different projects, with surprising results.

We need YOUR help for this BIG IDEA.

The final release will be available in spring 2015, little more than 1 year. During our development, we want to show you the auditions from the special characters in the game and if we finance this project, the instrumental rock band selected for the soundtrack of the game.

   Why we need your help? We are willing to present a magnifficent game, a trully amazing product; the GPS RTSG. Full of quality details, sound effects and visuals worthy of a high tier video game that undoubtedly created a new genre, absolutely focused on new mobile technologies developed and developing, such as augmented reality glasses based on 4G technology and future devices that use mobile augmented reality for daily use. Reaching these goals requires greater economic investment that we are not able to reach, is this point where your contribution can make this game as we really want it to be.

Ideas, this is the fundamental basis of our project, awesome ideas, different, innovative and surprising. This is a new game genre, we can reach as far as our imagination is capable of, every day we discover new elements and incorporate it on the project. This technology allows us for example to make the drives appear from under the ground or from the bottom of a lake or the sea. Your ideas can help exponentially in the outcome + development of the game, share those ideas with us.

What would you like to see?

How would you like to appear the units?

What new items that could be added? 

Considering that appear YOUR SIDE !

Why 300,000€?

Regardless of the initial funding that we had for the project, the number of ideas generated around it, has been impressive. This technology allows us to seek great achievements. One of the greattest goals that we can achieve is the creation of a global persistent battlefield, so that each player can create possession zones in the country they live in, remaining unchanged until another player decides to attack your area. For this purpose it is necessary to contract or acquiring large persistent servers , estimating a high volume of traffic that they must support, estimations that we have received re around 173,000€  for the acquisition of these servers and connecting them. The remaining necessary capital is divided into several programmers, hiring new modeling professionals, animation professionals, higher performance Workstations... Also hiring an instrumental rock band for the soundtrack of the game.

However, we insist in this idea, not only the investment is important for us, also your comments, so stay in touch with us!

DO NOT HESITATE TO CONTACT US TO BRING YOUR IDEAS, WE REALLY NEED THEM FROM YOU.

.

HELPER -   Thanks from all the team, you will be a part of our beta testers forum and we would send to you also an special PLvsM avatar.

SOLDIER -   All previous awards and a downloadable copy of the beta version  to become a PLvsM beta tester.

LANCE CORPORAL -   All previous awards and a downloadable full portfolio of all units in game, a downloadable poster signed by S.Budagosky, plus a full copy of the game when it will be released.

CORPORAL -   All previous awards and a pair of t-shirts with the PLvsM logos.

SERGEANT -   All previous awards and your name in the credits with the “Sergeant” tittle, plus all unit upgrades available from start when the first release will be outcome.

                                          

                                

LIEUTENANT -    All previous awards and your name in the credits with the “Lieutenant” tittle, plus special avatar, VIP access and tittle in our forums to collaborate with us.

CAPTAIN -    All previous awards and your name in the credits with the “Captain” tittle, also a full portfolio of the PLvsM art design and a numbered 3D printed copy of our “Mech”.                                                                                                                                

                                 

COMMANDER -    All previous awards x2 and your name in the credits with the “Commander” tittle, plus a  PLvsM USB designed by S.Budagosky with all original PLvsM content inside, sound track and auditions included.

GENERAL -    All previous awards and your name in the credits with the “General” tittle, also you can design for us several structures and units of PLvsM in direct collaboration with our design team. 

GENERAL CAPTAIN  -   All previous awards and your name figuring in the credits with the “Captain General” tittle. You will be a part of our team, in direct collaboration with all the staff. Your name will be in all the develop of the game, also your statue in 3D will be GPS located in the place of the world that you want. All players that play the game in that place will always see you with your name and tittle at the bottom of the statue. 

                                  

                                

You can also find us on our website, or contact us via e-mail on design@manincompany.com.
story_txt:
- " We know that our goal is ambitious, that ambition has meaning, get the best look and gameplay to PLvsM. But even if we do not get that goal, we will not stop working on every detail of the project to get it. Every Euro that is invested, every comment written, and every idea presented here, are respected and valued by us. And they are, and will be essential for this project ... Thanks for your support".Now commented on Vandal , sincere thanks for your contribution.   Manin
Company is a small software studio with big ideas, for three years we have
developed many applications on different platforms (iOS, Android and Windows),
focused on the general aspects of industry, we have focused our ability to be
continually working, government entities, medical surgery and the development
of virtual environments using our augmented reality engine. Applications such
as "Mercedes- Benz
Comercial Valencia" or
"Museum of Valencia Local Police"
guarantees our history, large companies have relied on our projects.
   During these three years,
we have developed our own technology of virtual reality and augmented reality
for mobile devices, this technology (Patent Pending) allows us to locate spaces
and virtual elements geo-located with an unseen high quality in augmented
reality applications. This technology is capable of representing large amount
of virtual elements in scene, without influencing the performance of your
mobile device.
   Based on this technology
and with a truly enthusiastic and team, we have decided to step higher, we have
moved all the development team to what we really like, MAKING VIDEOGAMES!    PLvsM originated from the idea
of ​​being able to experience a RTSG (RealTimeStrategicGaming) in real life,
feel the battle, with units being deployed around us. Enjoy a face to face game
with a good friend at an open space (public park or garden at our house), or
even a stranger on the other side of the world and see what he is seeing. Strategy
takes part of this; you could see where the enemy has deployed its units in
order to take advantage of the situation, defending or attacking.
   This game
type has been with us since computer development started, lets imagination and
creativity take part in this. Living this in first person is an exciting
experience. Why we should not take a really well known game gender and really feel
each new unit we generate, each new construction we build, each new enemy we
burrie?
    We desire to create this same experiences
on you, on the player, and of course, this experiences need to be highest possible
quality. For this, we need your help, having the right amount of investment involves
an improvement in all aspects of game development, human resource recruitment,
incorporating elements such as better quality modelling, appropriate
and original soundtracks or overall higher performance. Even your own ideas could
be part of this ambitious project. 
The laws of a RTSG have not changed, we all know them,
but we want to take those laws ... Out of our locked room.Test GPS tracking and synchronization.   Obviously, the battlefield is the real world surrounds
you, all kind of attack, defensive, exploration or civilian units would be deployed
in your well known environment. The general rules of running a complex RTSG are
taken into consideration within PLvsM, but with the added bonus of being able
to enjoy all these elements in first person, on your proper skin, around you. Like
a true commander in the battlefront.   Our technology allows us to
introduce new elements in the development of the game play, yet impossible to
use in a computer desktop game. The real world would affect the game. For
example, situating units on top of hills or buildings would give the player an
increased field of view because their position is being calculated via GPS
(locking its position, longitude, latitude and altitude) the units would be there.
The battlefield is observed from a higher position. All of this in order to
gain advantage over the enemy.As a new unit of the battlefield, “You” are the commander and it would make the difference. The game would consider you as a greater threat; enemy units automatically will attack you if they sight you. To defend you in first person, you can build a moving war unit "Mech" and handle it in first person in order to defend you from your immediate attackers, while you are continuously developing a defensive strategy. To increase the usage of this unit, will be given to the pilot driving the "mech" will receive a bonus. In combat and from inside this war unit, you can build defences at twice the speed than normal.    The upgrade system will be one of the most important features in game,
all structures and units could be upgraded to take advantage over your
opponent. By upgrading structures, you will dispose of special units and
characters like the "Spy unit". To achieve this you need a predetermined
amount of time and resources. We would implement "in Game" acquisitions,
that would boost your performance. For example, you can purchase "Time
Boosters" to accelerate the time taken to upgrade structures and units. In
advance we can say you that the full upgraded "Mech" will be a truly
Killer Machine...  Real time military
strategy game is a game where the user will create infrastructures through
construction units, manufacturers to extract resources and military units
attack and defend their territory. Including units with special abilities.
   We are
aiming to create a new type of game, a game where we can see the best of other
games of this genus, including new factors. GPS tracking and other telematic
networks.
   It will
be based on the GPS movement, so the user can move freely around the battlefield
in order to explore and clear the war-fog areas of the unexplored map. We will
have 3 main views in game, one on a 2D map where we have a flat representation
of the units that we are controlling and also the units that we could visualize
of the opponent because of the various in-game methods. The 2nd vision we will
have, will be a 3D vision in which we see virtual objects (units or buildings)
we have ahead. And finally we have another 3D view in which we will be inside
one of the "mech" unts, in wich we will be able to perform certain unique
actions.
The main objective of the game is the destruction of
enemy command centre. By doing this, the game is over.

 Gathering of multiple resources.

   The generation
of units would be based on the collection of certain resources that would be
spread over the field randomly, also automatically, the engine would know where to place the resources intelligently. For example, if there is a lake, no solid resources like metal would be placed in this lake. We could have two main resources such as gold,
oil, metal... (or as many as the development leads us to have). The resources can
be extracted by specific unit and when they are extracted, can be deposited on
the command centre or on other constructions like warehouses. Once built the
command centre, the collector units automatically seek those resources. 

 Generating Units :

   Having
a game where the vast majority of units will be mechanical (robots, mechs,
robotic and motorized vehicles ... )  are
going to be generated in a factory. These buildings have in visible areas
representative items or icons of their team, with colours.
Infantry units such as heavy or light are generated in
specific barracks.
The maximum number of units for one match would be
400, being total of 400/2 per team. The generation of these units will not be
linked to specific infrastructure, so from the first minute the player might
create as many units as possible. Unit generation would not be instantaneous.
User should take this time into consideration.

Technologies and improvements:

   Technologies
are divided into two sections, one that will be focused on resource issues such
as resource gathering speed and harvesting speed etc ... and on the other hand,
we have military technologies like armour Improvements, improved damage, range etc... Some  are generic and others
might grant ability to units.

Exploration of combat map :

   Exploration
is carried out in two ways, one, by the moving commander (proper user), or by
sending units (exploration or common) to do patrols or sweeps. The first option
will only be available as long as both players are playing close to each other
because if the separation is greater than 300 meters, it's impossible to move
in the area.
The ability to view enemy's camera will be available
only when spy units are created and sent to enemy territory.

Strategy:

Playing
a real time strategy game, involves taking into consideration many factors that
may tip the balance one way or another. Should consider the following
structure:
           -Coordinate effective resource gathering
           -Generating
units with available resources. 
           -Chosen
game mode (either attacker , aggressive attacker , defender, aggressive
defender or balanced)The
units can be arranged on 4 major groups. Within each unit we contemplate
different life value, attack, speed, reload speed , rate of fire , shields,
etc ..... Units should be compared only within its group.

Mechanical and / or motorized ground units 


 "Mechs"

      -Attack Power : Medium
      -Shielding: Average
      -Movement Speed : Average
      -Reload speed : medium
      -Fire rate : High

 Tanks

 Light
      -attack power : low
      -shield : low
      -Movement Speed : High
      -Reload speed : medium
      -Fire rate : High
Heavy
      -Attack power: High
      -Shield : High
      -Movement Speed : Low
      -Reload speed : low
      -Fire rate : Low  2.  Ground units walk
  Assault or heavy:
      -Attack power: Medium
      -Shield : Average
      -Movement Speed : Low
      -Reload speed : Average
      -Fire rate : Low
  Infiltration or light :
      -Attack power: Low
      -Shield : low
      -Movement Speed : Average
      -Reload speed : High
      -Fire rate : High
 3.  Aircrafts
Light
      -Attack power: Low
      -Shield : low
      -Movement Speed : High
      -Reload speed : High      -Fire rate : High
Heavy
      -Attack power: High
      -Shield : Average
      -Movement Speed : High
      -Reload speed : Average      -Fire rate : High
 4.  Defence Turrets
     -Against Heavy units
     -Against Air
     -Against Infantry .The approach of units and buildings for naval battles in areas surrounded by water is one of our objectives, because it really arouse passions such units in a RTSG. Our
main objective is to create the first real-time strategy game based on GPS
locations and augmented reality.
   Developing this type of
game is possible thanks to geolocation technology for augmented reality that
our team has created and financed from several other products. Other customers
have relied on us because we have an ability to perform innovative and
different projects, with surprising results. 
We need
YOUR help for this BIG IDEA.
The final release will be available in
spring 2015, little more than 1 year. During our development, we want to show
you the auditions from the special characters in the game and if we finance
this project, the instrumental rock band selected for the soundtrack of the
game. 
   Why we need your help? We
are willing to present a magnifficent game, a trully amazing product; the GPS
RTSG. Full of quality details, sound effects and visuals worthy of a high tier video
game that undoubtedly created a new genre, absolutely focused on new mobile
technologies developed and developing, such as augmented reality glasses based
on 4G technology and future devices that use mobile augmented reality for daily
use. Reaching these goals requires greater economic investment that we are not
able to reach, is this point where your contribution can make this game as we
really want it to be.
Ideas,
this is the fundamental basis of our project, awesome ideas, different,
innovative and surprising. This is a new game genre, we can reach as far as our
imagination is capable of, every day we discover new elements and incorporate
it on the project. This technology allows us for example to make the drives
appear from under the ground or from the bottom of a lake or the sea. Your
ideas can help exponentially in the outcome + development of the game, share
those ideas with us.
What
would you like to see? 
How

What
new items that could be added?  
Considering

300,000€? 
Regardless

However,

story:
Short Summary

We are an independent team of four people coming from different video game companies. We already worked on different released video game like « Save the Furries » or « Q.U.B.E » which known good sells.

Now it’s time for us to create our own project with Crate’s Odyssey which is an adventure puzzle game developed with the Unreal Engine 3 for iOS and PC. It’s really important for us to make something different than a simple puzzle game, that’s why we implement the adventure part with a real story, a real universe and a real evolution during the game.

The project is not possible without your help because we have just enough time and money to create a simple demo of the game. The future of the project is in your hand so we count on you.

 

What We Need & What You Get

At this moment we need 10 000$ to complete our budget. That money will be used to buy hardware and software, and to pay us during enough time to finish the game.

To thank you back for your funds on the project we have some good and unique perks to offer. It’s important for us that every people who believe on that game receive a copy of it as soon as it is available, that’s why we offer the game for only 20$.

Some perks give you special responsibilities on the game: create your own level, give us advice, take decisions etc.

A word if we don’t reach the goal of 10 000 $. Your trust is really important for us and you need to know that we will do our best with what we receive to complete the game, even if it’s not enough. For people who help us you’ll receive your perks anyway, we don’t need to reach our goal for that.

 

The Game

With a really early demo of the game we won a contest in France called “Game A Niaque”. We were judged by a lot of Video Games Company and we decided to continue the adventure because of all good critics we received that day. “Big potential”, “really original”, “already a professional look”. All critics were really motivating for us.

At this moment, the game is on a good way. We have a playable demo with all gameplay elements working fine. We have tested the game on an Iphone 3GS (30 FPS) and an Ipad 2 (60 FPS) and we have a nice render on both.

We are really confident with that game because we have a really good experience with the Unreal Engine and with iOS games, so we know what we are doing. The game has a nice graphical universe for kids and adults so everyone can play the game easily.

The game is original because it will mix the adventure and the puzzle game. It’s important for us to have a good story and a good evolution during the game (new powers, boss fights etc.). And it needs to have a good replay value that’s why we implement the puzzle game part.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

WHAT!!!! You can’t give us money? Don’t worry about that, you can help us in different ways.

If you like the game don’t hesitate and make some noise about the campaign, talk about it on your Facebook account and put the trailer into your blog, talk about it with your friends at school or at works, talk about it everywhere.

Last but not least, you can use the powerful Indiegogo share tools. Use it if you want to make easily noise about the game. You can find a share link of the game at the top of that page.

Don’t forget, we count on you.

Note 1: The magus used in videos is the property of “Trendy entertainments” and that character is coming from the game “Dungeon Defenders”. We use it because it was free source code but of course we have planned to create our own character for the final game.

Note2: A lot of objects into gameplay videos are just placeholder. If the campaign is a success we will improve everything.

story:
English Description below

Spenden statt Weihnachtskarten

Danke, dass du vorbei schaust bei unserer kleinen Weihnachtsspenden Kampagne. Wir freuen uns sehr darüber und möchten dir hier kurz die Gründe für die Aktion aufzeigen.

Unzählige Firmen senden dieser Tage tonnenweise Papier und teilweise unnützes Zeug durch die Gegend. Dabei fallen nicht unerhebliche Kosten an. Wir selbst haben in den letzten Jahren teilweise bis zu 1500,- Euro (pro Aktion, exklusive unserer Arbeitszeit) ausgegeben um Weihnachtskarten, Geschenke und Briefe zu verschicken. Einmal hatten wir tolle Lebkuchenkekse die aber zu 80% beschädigt angekommen sind.

Im letzten Jahr haben wir dann mit Kollegen zusammen eine Kampagne zur Unterstützung von Ebola Waisenkindern gestartet. Mit großem Erfolg und über 5300 Euro an Spendengeldern. Trotzdem, waren auch Karten und nicht unerhebliche, zusätzliche Kosten involviert die wir dieses Jahr besser verteilen wollen.

Daher haben wir uns für 2015 entschieden, eine kleine Spenden Kampagne zu starten und deinen Anteil der Spende werden wir noch mal oben drauf legen.


Ein Vorteil für Alle!

In dem wir auf Grußkarten mit Verpackung, die zusammen spätestens in wenigen Tagen in der Tonne landen, verzichten, die Post entlasten und das Geld einem gemeinnützigen Verein (dazu mehr weiter unten) zukommen lassen, entstehen ausschließlich Vorteile für Alle.

Wie funktioniert die Aktion und wie kann ich mitmachen?

Eigentlich ist alles sehr einfach und mit den Worten "You Donate, We Double" auch schon erklärt. Wir werden jede Spende (bis 2500,- Euro Gesamtsumme) von dir verdoppeln. Also aus 1,- Euro machen wir 2,-. Spendest du 50,-  Euro, machen wir 100,- Euro  draus. Und so weiter...

Zusätzlich haben wir einige sog. Perks mit dabei. Das sind Produkte oder Dienstleistungen, die man bei einer Spende in passender Höhe (oder höher) bekommen kann. Diese sind von der Anzahl aber begrenzt und daher solltest du schnell sein.


Warum machen wir das?

Uns persönlich und unseren Familien geht es im Grunde sehr gut. Die Probleme die sich bei uns hin und wieder zeigen sind meistens nicht zu vergleichen mit wirklichen Problemen von anderen Menschen dieser Welt. Gerade in Zeiten wie wir sie gerade erleben.

Wir sind sehr froh darüber, dass es viele Hilfsorganisationen gibt die in vielen Teilen der Welt mit ihrer Arbeit und den tollen Projekten Unterstützung leisten.

Da es aktuell unrealistisch ist selbst irgendwo in der Welt Hand anzulegen und Entwicklungshilfe zu leisten, nutzen wir die Möglichkeit zur finanziellen Unterstützung.

Wohin geht das Geld?

Wir sind schon seit Jahren Unterstützer von Plan International, UNICEF und "Ärzte ohne Grenzen". Da eine Patenschaft mehr ist als nur "Geld" zu spenden, UNICEF der Riese dieser dreien ist, haben wir uns dazu entschieden unsere (und eure Spende) an "Ärzte ohne Grenzen" (Deutschland) weiter zu geben. Zufällig ist auch genau diese Idee auf den aktuellen Flyer von Ärzte ohne Grenzen zu finden. (Tatsächlich reiner Zufall)


Noch Fragen?

Das ist unsere erste eigene Indiegogo Kampagne und daher ist es gut Möglich, dass wir noch Informationen vergessen haben. Wir stehen für dich natürlich jederzeit für Fragen zur Verfügung, entweder hier, via Email oder auf Facebook (www.facebook.com/carmenandingo)


DANKE - VON GANZEM HERZEN, DASS DU DABEI BIST!

Liebe Grüße

Carmen und Ingo Leitner mit Malia



+++ ENGLISH VERSION +++


Donations instead of Christmas Holiday Cards

Thank you for stopping by at our little Donation Campaign.

Below you find a short description of the WHAT, WHY and WHO.

Almost all companies are sending out Christmas Holliday Cards and other useless stuff during this time of the year. This can be quite expensive. We have had huge costs over the past years for varous different Christmas campaigns. A very expensive one was the one we sent out some cookies. 80% of them arrived broken.

In some of the years we have spent over 1500,- Euros for something not lasting very long. So we decided to do more useful things with that money this year (and maybe the coming years)


A benefit for everyone!

While saving on cards and envelopes, we additionally disburden the postal service and finally all the money is donated to a nonprofit (see below). So everyone is happy!


How does it all work?

Actually the words "You Donate, We Double" says it all. We double up your donation (to a maximum of 2500,- Euro). So we transform 1,- Euro from you into a total of 2,- Euros. You donate 50,-  Euro, we forward 100,- Euro etc.

In addition, we have some Perks ready for you as well. Products or services from us that we offer in return of the donation. Please be aware that the Workshop Videos are for German Speaking People Only!

Be quick, only a few Perks available


Why do we even bother?

Well, compared to so many people in this world we are very fortuned. Our families and we are doing well so why not support others right?

Thankfully there are many nonprofits out there and in times like these we can at least support one to help them do their (not so easy) job.

For us, it is not very realistic at the moment to head out into the world and do development assistance but it is to support those who do.


Who will get the donation?

We have supported three major organizations over the past years: Plan International, UNICEF and "Doctors without Borders".

A sponsorship with PLAN is more than just a donation, UNICEF is very big so we decided to go with "Doctors without Borders" (Germany).


Any questions?

Since this is our first own donation campaign there might still be open questions. Do not hesitated to ask us everything you want to know. Either here, via Email or sure on Facebook (www.facebook.com/carmenandingo)


THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR JOINING US!

LOVE

Carmen and Ingo Leitner with Malia
story_txt:
English Description below
Spenden statt Weihnachtskarten
 Danke, dass du vorbei schaust bei unserer kleinen Weihnachtsspenden Kampagne. Wir freuen uns sehr darüber und möchten dir hier kurz die Gründe für die Aktion aufzeigen.
Unzählige Firmen senden dieser Tage tonnenweise Papier und teilweise unnützes Zeug durch die Gegend. Dabei fallen nicht unerhebliche Kosten an. Wir selbst haben in den letzten Jahren teilweise bis zu 1500,- Euro (pro Aktion, exklusive unserer Arbeitszeit) ausgegeben um Weihnachtskarten, Geschenke und Briefe zu verschicken. Einmal hatten wir tolle Lebkuchenkekse die aber zu 80% beschädigt angekommen sind.
Im letzten Jahr haben wir dann mit Kollegen zusammen eine Kampagne zur Unterstützung von Ebola Waisenkindern gestartet. Mit großem Erfolg und über 5300 Euro an Spendengeldern. Trotzdem, waren auch Karten und nicht unerhebliche, 
zusätzliche 
 Kosten involviert die wir dieses Jahr besser verteilen wollen.
Daher haben wir uns für 2015 entschieden, eine kleine Spenden Kampagne zu starten und deinen Anteil der Spende werden wir noch mal oben drauf legen.

  Ein Vorteil für Alle!
In dem wir auf Grußkarten mit Verpackung, die zusammen spätestens in wenigen Tagen in der Tonne landen, verzichten, die Post entlasten und das Geld einem 
gemeinnützigen 
 Verein (dazu mehr weiter unten) zukommen lassen, entstehen ausschließlich Vorteile für Alle.
  Wie funktioniert die Aktion und wie kann ich mitmachen?
 Eigentlich ist alles sehr einfach und mit den Worten "You Donate, We Double" auch schon erklärt. Wir werden jede Spende (bis 2500,- Euro Gesamtsumme) von dir verdoppeln. Also aus 1,- Euro machen wir 2,-. Spendest du 50,-  Euro, machen wir 100,- Euro  draus. Und so weiter...
Zusätzlich haben wir einige sog. Perks mit dabei. Das sind Produkte oder Dienstleistungen, die man bei einer Spende in passender Höhe (oder höher) bekommen kann. Diese sind von der Anzahl aber begrenzt und daher solltest du schnell sein.

Warum machen wir das?
Uns persönlich und unseren Familien geht es im Grunde sehr gut. Die 
Probleme die sich bei uns hin und wieder zeigen sind meistens nicht zu 
vergleichen mit wirklichen Problemen von anderen Menschen dieser Welt. Gerade in Zeiten wie wir sie gerade erleben.
Wir sind sehr froh darüber, dass es viele Hilfsorganisationen gibt die in vielen Teilen der Welt mit ihrer Arbeit und den tollen Projekten Unterstützung leisten.Da es aktuell unrealistisch ist selbst irgendwo in der Welt Hand anzulegen und Entwicklungshilfe zu leisten, nutzen wir die Möglichkeit zur finanziellen Unterstützung.
 Wohin geht das Geld?
Wir sind schon seit Jahren Unterstützer von Plan International, UNICEF und "Ärzte ohne Grenzen". Da eine Patenschaft mehr ist als nur "Geld" zu spenden, UNICEF der Riese dieser dreien ist, haben wir uns dazu entschieden unsere (und eure Spende) an "Ärzte ohne Grenzen" (Deutschland) weiter zu geben. Zufällig ist auch genau diese Idee auf den aktuellen Flyer von Ärzte ohne Grenzen zu finden. (Tatsächlich reiner Zufall)Noch Fragen?
Das ist unsere erste eigene Indiegogo Kampagne und daher ist es gut Möglich, dass wir noch Informationen vergessen haben. Wir stehen für dich natürlich jederzeit für Fragen zur Verfügung, entweder hier, via Email oder auf Facebook (www.facebook.com/carmenandingo)

DANKE - VON GANZEM HERZEN, DASS DU DABEI BIST!
Liebe Grüße
Carmen und Ingo Leitner mit Malia

Show your support, by helping us reach our target Goal!

story:
Who are we and what we want

We are a developing group called "BROKEN HEAD STUDIOS", and we are been working for the last 8 months in a proyect with all our hopes and effort.

develop the MMORPG with the best playability until now. For this purpose we have decide to integrate action elements and platforms that will create a really entertaining experience for the users. Moreover, we want to innove and offer missions to the users that will be beyond gathering objects or finishing a number of NPCs and try to offer a more playable variety of missions, however if you like this kind of mission you will find some of them too. Besides, we want to implement some customization options that will make our game something like a life simulator, where the players could customize their clothes and houses where they will invite other players to their liking.

All of this will be implemented using the incredible graphics of UNREAL ENGINE 4. 


What is Odin?

In Odin you will find a world that has suffered a global catastrophe that almost finnished with all human existence. However, the few survivors that remain after the tragedy couldn´t imagine this shake seems to have awakened something malign in the world, causing an infinity of dangers and threats for the remaining vestiges of what once, was a glorious era technological civilization.

It´s been a century and a few decades since the disaster struck the planet and made all creation tremble. The survivors have increased greatly in number. Thanks to documents rescued from the ruins, a group of scientists that managed to survive the catastrophe hiding in a secure facility underground, managed to devise a defense systems designed to offer protection to entire cities by what they call commonly, energy domes.Thanks to this and after many difficult years, have succeeded in building large cities that offer a security that has allowed human beings to rejoin civilization, even though the world is not a safe place for anyone outside of the protection domes offer.

The world is now populated with all kinds of ruthless creatures that have adapted to the most extreme and uninhabitable areas and are scattered across the face of the earth. The humans know they still not safe, and it's a matter of time that what lurks on the other side of the sturdy shell of their cities decide to launch an offensive with the sole intention of bringing the human race to extinction. Those chosen who are the hope of human being will not sit idly by, they are ready to go outside and find a way to end the abominable creatures that threaten to destroy them.



Characteristics

  •     · MMORPG and Social Network at the same time:

Odin will have a social network internally implemented in the game.Users will access this through its virtual mobile device, which will connect all users together.This device will work as if each of the game's characters have a smartphone with the same features as the real one, they  may use his camera to record videos or take pictures of the game environment and other players. And thanks to the device, it will be posible to upload content directly to the social network to instantly share and show the community what they are doing. They could even turn the device to perform a self-photo with their character and what they have behind.The social network would behave in the same way that any existing social network today.


  •   ·Dynamic Development System:

After selecting main class for its character, the player will have to choose one of the 3 branches of its initial class. However, it will be posible later to combine with any of the branches of other classes in the game, so there will be a lot of interesting possibilities when developing a character. Or on the other hand they may wish to stay only with the branches belonging to their initial class, which is a guarantee that their character will develop properly. Any character may reset at any time all his skills, and even define tables with different skill configurations which can be exchanged whenever he is out of combat. Likewise, he may attach a default computer for use with each table of skills, that when activated automatically matches the table, to make it more convenient and faster.

  •   ·Locations and Secret Bosses:

Odin's map will be full of hidden locations that players will have to find making use of the clues and puzzles, that NPC towns and vicinity will drop subtly.No signs will take you directly to these places, or guide you unconditionally.You´ll have to find doing research of your own or asking the community and the veterans.

  •   ·Epic battles with bosses:

In the dungeons there will be some interactivity options  with the environment that will offer some help to the players.For example, in one of the dungeons we´ll find a giant stone golem, in the combat scenario you can activate a mechanism that will make a heavy object hit him from the ceiling.If you synchronize and carry it into the path of the golem, the coup will succeed, otherwise fail, but  after a few minutes you´ll have the opportunity to try again.If you hit it right, the golem will fall stunned for a few seconds, in this time agility type characters will be able to climb to a balcony-like structure on its back, after that the enemy will get up and keep fighting and moving around the stage with some players above in real time. The players who ride also get a damage bonus, but will have to jump from the structure at some point as the enemy launched an attack that automatically kill anyone who does not jump in time to dodge. Is not it epic to death? As this is just an example.

  •   ·Dungeons full of challenges:

In Odin, the dungeons are not simple instances that are entered only with the intention of ending up with a "Final Boss" , they will also be the location of many secrets.For example, players can fall into a lot of traps that there will be scattered throughout the dungeon, may be victims of ambushes and stabbing in the back, or powerful enemies unexpected appearances that will test your skill, and even some challenges with platforms, jump will be important in our game. All these features are some of the innovations that we carry out, among many other things that will result surprising for the players.Finally we should mention, that despite all this we want to preserve the essence of a good RPG MMO, but offering more customization options and interaction between users by providing new gameplay options in this genre of games.

We count on you to be able to realize our project. Thanks for taking the time to visit our project, we hope you enjoyed it.


Our development team:

Daniel Pérez - Project manager, Programming
Juan Carlos Rubio - Programming
Pablo García Ortega - Designer
David Sánchez - Designer
Victor Manuel - Designer
Rubén Barrocal - 3D Modeler
Pablo López - 3D Modeler
Alexis Montiel - 3D Modeler
Rubén Escribano - 3D Modeler
Enrique Arguelles  - 3D Modeler
Javier Gamero - 3D Modeler
Alberto Ramírez - 3D Modeler
Diego Luján - 3D Modeler and textures
Anselmo Resa  - 3D Modeler , textures, Animator, VX ...
Pablo Nicolás Pastor - Character Modeler                                                             Ismael Alcázar - Animator                                                                                       Cristina Gomez - Animator



  See you in the game!

story:
Summary

Fitz the Fox is a cute platform game about a fox who goes on an adventure to save his girlfriend. Fitz must go through 3 worlds to get to the boss keeping his girl captive. 

It's controls are responsive enough to be challenging but fair, and play test have shown that the game can be enjoyed by all ages. 

With graphics based on a classic 8-bit handheld, this game is sure to bring back some fond memories. Fitz's genuine personality makes him a perfect fit into the world of classic video game mascots. 

When Fitz the Fox is released it'll be $2.99 on PC and $0.99 on phones.

The game is just about done but I need your help to share this game around the globe.


Where's the Money?

What I've taken care of:

  • $800 - Game development software
  • $250 - Development desktop PC
  • $650 - Compiling Mac mini 

What I need your help with:

  • $100 - Steam Greenlight
  • $25 - Android market
  • $100 - Apple app store 
  • $150 - Website and hosting fees
  • $100 - Windows phone store
  • $275 - general advertising


The Big Picture

Fitz the Fox is a great game but it's not the end of the road. 

If we can get this game out it will help fund future projects of mine. I have many great game ideas but no way to share them. Your contribution could get this indie dev (7 years in the making) off of the ground. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you dont have the money to contribute that's fine. There are many other ways you can help:

  • Go out and tell people about this game.
  • Indiegogo has share buttons for everyone to use!

story:
'Digital Warrior Studios' is a newly founded gaming studio based in Melbourne, Australia. We are comprised of highly skilled Concept Artists, Modellers, Animators, Programmers and Composers boasting multiple awards. At 'Digital Warrior Studios' we hope to provide a new spin to the gaming experience through our diverse range of games. To challenge, to entertain, to amaze and to capture our players into a whole new world; to lose themselves-even for a moment to the pure enjoyment of the game.

Your help we will enable ‘Digital Warrior Studios’ to be up and running as a fully licenced games design firm.

Our ultimate goal is to raise $100,000 as this will assist us in paying for our staff and licencing in order to hasten our console releases.

With that being said our first and primary goal is to have everything we require to be licenced so will be focusing on a $30,000 goal which will allow for iOS, Android and Stream releases of our games.

Your kind generosity will not only aid in our goals as a company but also assist in the marketing of gaming in Australia. All of our employees are proud to be associated with a new and upcoming venture fuelled by great, passionate and creative Australian talent. By helping us you are helping to fund a gaming studio that can last the distance, that can compete on an international playing field and bring more positive publicity on our community as a whole.

Here are 'Digital Warrior Studios' we understand that not everyone will be able to contribute financially however that does not worry us. All we truly ask for is for you to please share this campaign to raise awareness to our goals, help our name get out there!

However should you be able to provide monetary support we would be happy to offer our brand/game specific perks as a thank you for your help.

Should we not reach our goal of $30,000 please know that your donation will not be misused. It will be put towards the savings for legally purchased licences and programs that we will use for the manufacturing of our games. At any point should you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us.

We want to be as transparent as possible with your generosity so you know what exactly you're contributing towards.

We would like to thank you for reading our proposal here at Indiegogo as it is a great way to get out there and be heard- so if you could please take the time to share this it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you once again.

 

Here is just some of the Artwork of our talented Artists.

My City - Boss Logic

 

The Guardian - Alter

 

 

GOALS:

$30,000: Fully Licensed and ready to launch first game.

$25,000: Contracts – Programmer, Concept Artist, Animator, Music, 3D Modeller and Level Designer.

$15,000: Fully Licensed Software.

$5,000: Studio Licensing

All of our employees are proud to be associated with a new and upcoming venture fuelled by great, passionate and creative Australian talent. By helping us you are helping to fund a gaming studio that can last the distance, that can compete on an international playing field and bring more positive publicity on our community as a whole.
Here are 'Digital Warrior Studios' we understand that not everyone will be able to contribute financially however that does not worry us. All we truly ask for is for you to please share this campaign to raise awareness to our goals, help our name get out there!
However should you be able to provide monetary support we would be happy to offer our brand/game specific perks as a thank you for your help.
Should we not reach our goal of $30,000 please know that your donation will not be misused. It will be put towards the savings for legally purchased licences and programs that we will use for the manufacturing of our games. At any point should you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us.
We want to be as transparent as possible with your generosity so you know what exactly you're contributing towards.
We would like to thank you for reading our proposal here at Indiegogo as it is a great way to get out there and be heard- so if you could please take the time to share this it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you once again.
 
Here is just some of the Artwork of our talented Artists.

My City - Boss Logic
 

The Guardian - Alter
 
 
GOALS:
$30,000: Fully Licensed and ready to launch first game.
$25,000: Contracts – Programmer, Concept Artist, Animator, Music, 3D Modeller and Level Designer.
$15,000: Fully Licensed Software.
$5,000: Studio Licensing

story:
Welcome to the Adventure

Build and protect your village, increase your attack strength, defense, and other skills to defeat Goblins and Orcs.

RyuShima3D, a MMORPG, playing on a fictive island, will transfer you into an incredible world of adventure. You start as a young apprentice, learning the basics and will need to decide your future path. There will be different classes within the game, like magicians, warlords, builders and many others you will have to choose from. Each class will have their own pros and cons.

During the game play you will be challenged to complete many quests and tasks, all of them will help you raise your strength, power and knowledge.

The island is populated with different characters; there are Humans, Orcs, Goblins, Dragons and many other species. Some of them are your friends and will help you defend your village. Others will do whatever they can to destroy you.

RyuShima3D can be played online and offline. the online version will allow you to create alliances with your friends to get even stronger.

And there is more to come…

Over a ten-to-twelve month period, OIE will develop their next game, a MMORPG adventure.  The whole development will unfold in real time for all the Supporters to see through our Developer Backend (Forum). The game will be developed for online web players, PC/MAC version, iOS (iPAD, iPhone) and Android. An Xbox Live version will be released later.

Be part of the development team

There will be a private online community set up for the Supporters to discuss the project with the developers   and submit their input, thoughts and feelings about the game's content and direction. They will be able to vote on decisions in which directions the game should go.  Supporters will also be able to help test the game once a beta version is available.  When the game is finished, Supporters will then receive the completed version in the available format of their choice.
For fans of MMORPG adventure games, this is a chance to prove that there is still a large demand out there for a unique medium that inspired so many of us.

Rewards

This whole experience is being offered for the flat Supporter contribution of $10.  We believe that beyond the reward of receiving the finished game, the ability to be a participant in the project makes this a unique opportunity.  

For anyone who wants to contribute above and beyond the call, we have a selection of premium rewards ranging from a download of the full documentary series in splendid 1080p HD video with bonus footage, to unique posters, original concept art done by the game's artist!

story:
Imagine what it would be like to have something like Wikipedia, but for Video Games? And imagine that you can be a part of getting it up the ground and running!

What is Orcz.com?

Orcz.com is an extensive video games wiki. We want to really go into video games! Its been running for a while, but we want to get it up to the next level.

Articles and other pages on Orcz.com are written by gamers just like you, who collaborate and create a huge tome of information for everything pertaining to video games!

We want to go deep into the games and include every piece of information about the games including information about the publishers and creators, tips and strategies for the game, walkthroughs, and more!

What will the money be used for?

1) Server costs - As the wiki becomes bigger and more and more popular, it requires more bandwidth and a more powerful server. This is the biggest expense. Most of the money will be used to purchase and maintain a good server that will be able to handle all the traffic.

2) Development - While the wiki mostly runs on open source software, some of the money will be used to develop some cool custom features that will enhance the "video games" side of the Wiki

3) Editors - While most of the wiki is edited by gamers like you, some of the money will be used to pay to professional editors who will help oversee the general direction of the wiki, and contribute professionally to make this wiki the best there is.

Who is behind this?

RarityGuide Inc, a small company based in San Francisco, CA. We run a leading video games Q&A website, called GameShampoo.com, so we know video games!

Thank You!

Additional ways you can help the wiki:

1) Spread the Word about this wiki!

2) Go to Orcz.com and help improve it! Add additional entries, or improve existing pages!

story:
Update! Listen to part of the soundtrack!

Here's a short teaser of the soundtrack on SoundCloud!

Hi! I'm David and I make music.

When I grew up in a suburb south of Stockholm, Sweden, both of my parents worked professionally with music (they've since retired), so perhaps it was inevitable that one day I would, too.

The starting point was when I got a Game Boy for Christmas. I loved playing games on it and I also really liked the music in those games. Playing along on my parents' piano with the tunes coming out of the machine's tiny speaker not only got me hooked on making music, but also on game music in particular. When I was sixteen, I wrote the music to Eternal Daughter, my first original soundtrack.

Fast-forward several years (how time flies!) and now I'm trying to make ends meet as a freelance musician. I feel fortunate that I get to know and work with lots of talented people, such as the folks at MADSOFT Games. I've scored their latest game, "Me and My Dinosaur 2" which is coming out soon. (Check out their website for more info!)

Help me release my soundtrack!

I want to release the music as a stand-alone soundtrack and am hard at work preparing for that. However, my meager independent budget makes parts of that rather tough. That's why I'm running this campaign; to make the finished product as good as possible!

Before releasing the soundtrack, I want to get all 40 tracks mastered by a professional mastering engineer. That way, the music will sound great no matter how or where you listen to it. Also, because there are still people who collect CDs, I'd like to do a physical print run as well - in which case mastering is more or less a necessity.

Both CD mastering and printing are rather expensive, but I've managed to get really good deals on both and I do have some funds dedicated for this already. So, I don't need gazillions of dollars, but I still need another $1200 on top of what I already have. That covers both mastering, printing and shipping all the physical CDs out.

Everybody loves stretch goals.

While $1200 covers mastering, printing and shipping, I would of course be thrilled if the campaign raises even more. So if the base amount is exceeded, I'll go above and beyond:

  • $1800 and all funders get a selection of Me and My Dinosaur 2 DLC! Extend the game with plenty of new content (otherwise sold separately). Also, the CD will come in a glossy, beautiful four-panel digipak! This will be a once-in-a-lifetime collectible - any further reprints will be in sleeves. I'll even sign your copy if you want to. ;)
  • $2500 and I'll write and record an original song based on themes from the soundtrack - with lyrics and everything! - as a separate single that all funders get for free before everybody else!
  • $3000 and I'll make a set of sheet music arrangements of selected songs from the soundtrack included with every physical CD! It'll feature several different ensembles, from pop band to string quartet and more. It'll also include the original song mentioned above!

If the grand total ends up even higher, well, I'll figure something out! If, on the other hand, I don't end up raising even the base amount, I'll figure that one out too. Also, everyone will be refunded if the base amount isn't reached.

More ways to help out.

Perhaps you feel you just can't afford to put down any money right now, and that's fine - I totally understand. I know what it's like to have to think twice about buying anything except the bare necessities. It sucks, but that's just the way it is sometimes.

If you want to do something anyway, though, I'd appreciate it so much! For instance, you can spread the word about the campaign. Use Indiegogo's built-in sharing tools, tell your friends or post about it on your blog, Twitter, Facebook or wherever you cool kids hang out.
