story:
Millon thanks are not enough for your support!.

Hello, we are Nicolás Zuasti and Valentina Mele, founders of Imaginatio Software.

We finally decided to make a leap of faith and let our dreams come true by starting as  a tiny little Game Developing Enterprise in our own home town, Paysandú - Uruguay.

We have been all over the place as freelancers, doing web development, and major software production. Always dreaming about doing what we truly love, making games.

The traveler
Our first game!. Please feel free to try the online demo
The traveler is a really fun way to explore the most famous regions of the world while learning about they most notorious features.
This is a point and click 2D arcade game that will be launched for PC, web and mobile devices .
Each level will represent a city or place in the world that has colorful history and features. Every level will present you with a core functionality that can be viewed in the video, a mechanic specific for every city or place and perhaps one or two fun secrets.

What this game represents for us

This game represents the realization of our dreams.
 As long time gamers, there is only one thing we enjoy more than playing fun, true and honest games, that is making them.
While making this game we set ourselves on a journey to stabilsh the first Game Company in our home town, giving young local talents a reason to stay here and develop the kind of life they have only dreamed about.

People like you has given ourselves the chance to make our dreams come true, and for that we gave you our eternal gratitude.

What we need

Simply put we need money, that money will be used in:

  • Interns salaries
We have enlisted the assistance of 3 young developers that are pretty happy to be working with us for free. But they do so much, and are so amazing with us that we would really love to give them something back.
  • Graphical and sound assets
At the moment we have no artists working with us. So little is our home town that every designer moves to the capital city to work. We have no other choice but to hire remote professionals to be part of the development group that makes this game.
  • Hardware
We will buy working stations for our interns that aren't meant to be shown in museums!

Can't donate but still wants to support us?

Your support is absolutely essential for our success. 

  • Share this with your friends and family.  
  • Use IndieGOGO social features to share this campaign.
  • Play the demo and share your thoughts about it with us (there will be a contact us in the demo in the next few days).
story_txt:
Millon thanks are not enough for your support!.
Hello, we are Nicolás Zuasti and Valentina Mele, founders of Imaginatio Software.
We finally decided to make a leap of faith and let our dreams come true by starting as  a tiny little Game Developing Enterprise in our own home town, Paysandú - Uruguay.
We have been all over the place as freelancers, doing web development, and major software production. Always dreaming about doing what we truly love, making games.

The traveler

Our first game!. Please feel free to try the online demo

The traveler is a really fun way to explore the most famous regions of the world while learning about they most notorious features.
This is a point and click 2D arcade game that will be launched for PC, web and mobile devices .
Each level will represent a city or place in the world that has colorful history and features. Every level will present you with a core functionality that can be viewed in the video, a mechanic specific for every city or place and perhaps one or two fun secrets. What this game represents for us
This game represents the realization of our dreams.
 As long time gamers, there is only one thing we enjoy more than playing fun, true and honest games, that is making them.
While making this game we set ourselves on a journey to stabilsh the first Game Company in our home town, giving young local talents a reason to stay here and develop the kind of life they have only dreamed about.
People like you has given ourselves the chance to make our dreams come true, and for that we gave you our eternal gratitude.   What we need Simply put we need money, that money will be used in:  Interns salaries 
We have enlisted the assistance of 3 young developers that are pretty happy to be working with us for free. But they do so much, and are so amazing with us that we would really love to give them something back.

Graphical and sound assets
At the moment we have no artists working with us. So little is our home town that every designer moves to the capital city to work. We have no other choice but to hire remote professionals to be part of the development group that makes this game.


Hardware
We will buy working stations for our interns that aren't meant to be shown in museums!

    Can't donate but still wants to support us? Your support is absolutely essential for our success. 



Share this with your friends and family.  

Use IndieGOGO social features to share this campaign.
Play the demo and share your thoughts about it with us (there will be a contact us in the demo in the next few days).

story:
Rise of the Living is a zombie survival RTS/RPG hybrid. 

Check out the game on IndieDB

PreAlpha 0.05 - Released! - Download Here

Needs

Survivors as "sim" like creatures. They need several different resources to survive in the world. Since the world is pretty much over the survivors only care about the essentials, food, security, socializing, and energy. Other needs such as medical care for example gets tacked on when a survivor is sick. Just because the survivors have these “needs” doesn’t mean you have to tend to them in a micromanaging way. You don’t tell them to go eat, they just go eat when they get hungry provided there is something available to eat. When they get tired they go to sleep at their houses.

Since survivors have minds of their own, they can sometimes ignore the commands issued by your leader. If this happens, you can “shout” commands to force them to comply but this lowers the respect the survivor has of the leader if abused. If respect gets too low the survivor will pack their things and leave the camp so it’s important to manage relations. A survivor will also leave if the food supply is empty for too long, the camp gets overrun by zombies or armies from other camps, has a huge fight with another camp member and many others.

Death

When a survivor goes hungry for too long their health starts to take a hit. Eventually they will die if they do not find food. Death is a big deal in this game. A map will only sprinkle in immigrants at a desirable level if a camp reaches a certain level of fame. This means that if too many people die then the population will be scarce until the built-in immigration system repopulates the map which is a slow process and the survivor could appear anywhere on the map. There are a few ways to die, hunger, attacked by zombie/survivor, illness, and suicide. After dying, the survivor becomes a zombie and roams about the world looking for fresh meat.

Other survivors in the camp are affected deeply by death and it can lower the camps overall morale. Just because the world is over doesn’t mean we have suddenly become savages. Survivors in your camp can be hesitant to kill another human and often express remorse when they do kill. Be careful of asking weaker constituted survivors to do the “dirty” work as they may leave or take their own life.

Backgrounds

Survivors didn’t just appear out of thin air when the apocalypse started, they were there when times were good and they are here now when things have gone to s**t. You can get to know a survivor by conversing with them through the dialogue system. The more you get to know about them, the more favor you will have with them. A high favor will ensure that survivor follows commands stricter than others and exhibits more loyalty to the leader. In addition, the backstories of the survivors will be extensive and widely variant due to a procedural generation system. The custom story generator dissects the aspects of a background story and substitutes tags from a large pool to create believable stories (and some not) that we can then cull and ship with the game. I want this game to bring you to tears when a survivor you have been with for a while is killed by a huge horde that was approaching the campsite. Each play through will be unique as you watch the different personalities battle it out in the camp and between the camps.

The previous jobs of survivors, their personalities, talents and story quirks will contribute their skill levels and possibly give them a specific class that will provide a camp with new functionality.

Groups

The world is filled is with other survivors that have what it takes to be called a leader. These other leaders will do the same things that you do as a human player. They will explore the world, build a camp, recruit other survivors and they may even attack you if you encroach on their territory. While civilization may be dead, the world is not and there is always so much going at any point in the game. As the leader of a group you need to manage everything and deal with the responsibilities of the job. If I get enough funding I will be adding in features like camp government where a survivor can be appointed to handle a portion of your job. You can allow for voting or you can appoint someone with both methods having their pros and cons.

Skills

Shooting – SURVIVAL RULE #2. A gun is man’s best friend in the zombie apocalypse. What used to be a hobby is a now a requirement for basic survival.  An unskilled shooter will miss often and can only handle basic weapons. As the survivor makes kills their skill will increase but they can also train at the shooting range. Be careful though, shooting is loud and attracts zombies to the area so use it sparingly.

Speed – SURVIVAL RULE #5. I don’t have to out run the zombies, I just have to out run you. The faster you are, the quicker you can get somewhere. This skill doesn’t really build and is an inherent skill that will decrement if the survivor gets sick or injured. Don’t worry, it can return to normal though once the survivor is healed (with a minor penalty of course).

Stamina – SURVIVAL RULE #1. If you run out of Stamina, your death clock starts ticking faster. You won’t be able to fight or run. You’re as a good as dead. The number displayed is the max stamina the survivor can have. A higher Stamina skill means running longer distances and dishing out more punches or bat swings. Stamina replenishes with rest and sleep so be sure to let a tired survivor get some rest before taking them out again.

Strength – SURVIVAL RULE #3. You gotta know when to hold ‘em and when to fold ‘em, other times you just gotta kick some zombie ass. A survivor’s strength is an indicator of how good at fighting they are. It dictates how much damage they deal when they hit something. Higher strength skill allows for larger more deadly weapons to be used. A downside and upside of strength is that it is tied to stamina. Each attack makes the survivor more tired often leading to them being unable to deal another blow or even escape. The upside however is that melee training also raises the stamina skill so they are usually able to complement each other.

Stealth – SURVIVAL RULE #4. If you can stay hidden, you can stay alive. The stealth skill controls how loud a survivor is when moving around and looting containers. It also affects the survivors contribution to the camps overall noise presence. Stealth is built doing things in stealth stance or reading books at the camps library.

Stats

Happiness – This stat is calculated by the inventory of the survivors group, security of the group, and whether any events have occurred in the recent past. These events include group members dying or the bringing back of a large haul of resources.

Zombie Kills – Literally how many zombies the survivor has killed

Survivor Kills – The amount of survivors that have been murdered

Hunger – How hungry the survivor currently is. If it gets too low, the survivor will seek out food.

Health – The amount of the life the survivor has. If health dips too low the survivor will flee and seek shelter. They will also try to get medical help either through a med kit or at the medical station.

Honor – How honorable your actions are. If you do things like murder survivors, your honor will go down but will go up if you deliver goods to another survivor camp. If your camps collective honor is excessively low then you form a reputation that will cause unencountered groups to have a negative bias towards you from before meeting you.

Slow, ugly, stupid creatures that only want to eat you and will do anything to do it. I didn’t want special zombies nor did I want zombies that can run because they are too stupid to run. This makes the games dynamic interesting as a zombie or three is no real threat but when they show up in hordes >30, you will have a big problem because you can easily get cornered if you aren’t in an open area. The risk is even higher if you lead them back to your base, where they will kill sleeping survivors and chase off other ones.

Item Variety

The amount of items in the game is planned to basically be limitless. I have designed the game to already have a JSON script parser that transforms scripts that anyone can make it game items. If you don’t like the images for the included guns, you can just swap out the images and restart the game. If you don’t think the food in the game gives enough hunger boost, you change the modifier values in the script and it will change the game. You can also introduce new items to the game by using the program I use to make the items. I will be releasing this tool with game and basically it streamlines the process of making new game items. You can make a new food types, medicines, weapons, luxury items, pretty much anything you want.

Scavenging/Looting

There is no such thing as a free lunch so you better get used to going out and searching for supplies. Around there world are a few small towns with plenty of lootable buildings that can be sacked with little to medium effort. Once these supply stores are all exhausted, groups can venture into the main city in the center of the map. While the loot is plenty, the danger is high and can lead to the loss of a survivor or the whole scavenging party. This progression of resource exhaustion and pushing towards the city slowly increases the games difficulty and results in a natural end point where the map has nothing left to offer to keep a group alive. At this point I will allow the group to be exported and you can then start a new map with the same group from your previous map. It will be kind of like moving to a new region.

Forestry/Hunting/Farming

The trees in the game aren’t there to just look pretty. You can chop them down and use them to build your camp. Sometimes you get lucky and find a pile of wood in the forest from a storm or at the local hardware store. Animals like deer can be hunted and chickens and hogs can be kept for food. Survivors can plant seeds they find and grow food for the camp so you don’t have to constantly be sending out search parties.

Camp

Your camp is your home and base of operations. Without a camp your sphere of influence is low and you can’t issue commands to far away survivors. Establishing a camp also allows for the placement of other buildings such as houses, storage pallets, workshops and medical bays.

Construction

Survivors will spend time building each structure until it is completed. There will be a large variety of buildings in the final game but the alpha will only have a select amount until further development is completed.

The World

While you can of course build inside the buildings of the world, I wouldn’t recommend it as it results in a bottle neck if your survivors wish to escape from a zombie attack. Who am I to tell you no and not let you do it so I implemented it as a feature. Eventually the buildings that you would normally place outside will just be place inside without their outer exterior which they won’t need inside.

Missions serve to build favor between a leader and a prospective survivor recruit, two survivor camps or just any two survivors. The intention is make the missions scriptable just like the dialogue and item system already completed. With a scripted system it would allow for players to make their own custom missions.

Starting Locations

There will be three starting scenarios to choose from in the final build of the game. The first and hardest is starting in the center of the city and having to escape before being able to build a defendable camp. The medium setting would be being placed in one of the maps towns and having to survive from that point and the easiest is being placed in the woods away from much of the chaos.


My name is Fuad Mefleh and I'm a PhD graduate in Bioengineering out of Clemson University.  I have a background in C/C++ programming with applications in medical software development and embedded systems design.  So you are wondering, why does an engineer want to make a game?
One of my motivations for learning to program was to make video games that I would like to play in my downtime. While all of the games out there are fun and literally time black holes I felt there was something missing in a genre I found particularly interesting. I wanted to explore what its like to lead a group of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world. Games such as State of Decay have implemented this but the AI is severely lacking. I want to bring life to these dead worlds and present to you, the player,compelling and realistic back stories that influence the way the AI behaves.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm running this early campaign to collect funds for several reasons. They are as follows:
  • Hire a 3D modeler to convert ideas and sketches to game entities. 
  • Either purchase or have sounds recorded for both survivors and zombies
  • Hire a graphic designer to create a new UI
Get the game at a huge discount through the early bird perks!  They are limited so get them while they last.  There are going to be PreAlpha demos on the games IndieDB page until the roll out of the official alpha in a little over a month.

    The Impact

    I am a seasoned programmer with over 5 years experience and I have a doctorate in Bioengineering and developed an image-guided surgery framework from scratch. This project is something I have been waiting to do but had to wait on because of academics. Your donation to this project will help me get this idea to the alpha stage where I can hopefully release the game and it can provide funds for itself. I plan to use every cent raise on developing the game and getting the assets needed designed and created.

      Risks & Challenges

      I feel that my skills are strong enough to tackle a challenge like developing

      a video game. While I know I can do a lot of things, I am choosing not to bite off too much. I chose to make the game single player because it adds unneeded complexity. I want this game to be rich enough without multiplayer and I believe it will be.

      If I am not able to raise the necessary funds through this campaign to employ the required personnel I will have to pay from my own pocket. Ideally I would like this game to support itself and not serve as a means for me to make money. 

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Get the word out about this game if you like it.  Tell your mom, dad, brother, sister, girlfriend, boyfriend... you get the point.  The more people that know the more chances I'll have at someone donating.

story:
Mission

Our goal is to make an APP for IOS and Android. Free to download. But with the possibility to involve real money into the game. It means you can win some good cash with the help of your brain skills.

view pic.

We feel we have a mission, some problems we need to solve by making our game app:

- Give people who likes playing mind games a possibility to have poker-room benefits (tournaments, different limits,  different types of good and weak players, a chance to win real money and titles, a chance to become a sportsman).
- Create a new gameplay and a possibility to win for everyone: experienced players and beginners.
- Create a massive mind competition. We want people develop their mind skills, want to make this process easy and full of fun.



Just a minute to start playing!

A player should know just some basic rules to start playing. All the rest is strategy and experience. Here are those rules.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dots_(game)
Another paper and pencil game? Not at all.

view pic.

We would like to underline that we build a Platform, a System, that's gonna bring a SPECIAL experience.


The paragraph for poetry:

We feel we make a genetic experiment. We cross two creatures - poker and GO (Dots forerunner) - to give a birth to monster. Or superhero.

Dots game  reflects the way the contemporary society lives. It's perfect both for consuming on the way as well as for building long lasting experience from colorful kaleidoscope pieces of glass.



System

At the first stage we will develop the following “chapters”: 

view pic.

1. The Challenge (one on one single games) 

2. The Way (the multilevel system of unlimited number of games with similar to poker Ring Games (or cash tables) feeling) 

3. The Tourneys (a huge system of online tournaments with all “poker” factors like time, limits, rebuys etc. It's an exciting competition, which can make you a rich guy - another Cinderella) 

4. The Sandpit (one on one single games with no points or money factor. Just playing for fun or practicing)

  view pic.

Our team:

Andrei aka Andron Mandroje. One word - creator. Many words here.

Ruslan aka Unknown. One word - not enough. Guru. Superstar of programming. More about him.

Valera aka McCarych. No words. Just beautiful Mock-ups above and below.

Aleksei Konstantinov. He is a new team member, and a proof that we have already benefited a lot from this campaign. Aleksei is a superstar of programming  - Master of coding - and soon everyone will see first results of his work (and of course the rest of the team's work as well). We will publish a web-page where everybody will be able to try Dots in a one -on-one mode. This is gonna become one of the steps from Dots towards DotsBook.


We need your help!

...we understand how karma works

Things we've already done:

 - We have a plan

 - Game design documentation. Miles of step-by-step instructions. A year of work we can be proud of.

- Design and Mock-ups ready for programming (sleepless nights for McCarych, his wife and two babies..) Some of them are above. 

 - we started building server part of the project and very excited to continue it with  your help.

 - A strategy of development. Many thanks to guys who got some our "lyfts" and "ubers"  in Silicon Valley for professional help and great ideas .

- PR-plan. This campaign is one of it's points))


Things we need money for:

 - some  programming (basically - client-side; we're 50% good with server-side). It's a big part of work, but we can't wait to start it - so many ideas to impress the audience. 

 - servers

 - testing (bughunters are welcome)

PR-campaign and promotion is essential as well, but we are ready to spend some...major part of our savings to launch it.

You can also help by sharing this page or giving us a Facebook like
https://www.facebook.com/DotsBookApp 

Lets turn another page of DotsBook!
story_txt:
MissionOur goal is to make an APP for IOS and Android. Free to download. But with the possibility to involve real money into the game. It means you can win some good cash with the help of your brain skills.view pic.We feel we have a mission, some problems we need to solve by making our game app: -	Give people who likes playing mind games a possibility to have poker-room benefits (tournaments, different limits,  different types of good and weak players, a chance to win real money and titles, a chance to become a sportsman). -	Create a new gameplay and a possibility to win for everyone: experienced players and beginners. -	Create a massive mind competition. We want people develop their mind skills, want to make this process easy and full of fun.Just a minute to start playing!
A player should know just some basic rules to start playing. All the rest is strategy and experience. Here are those rules.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dots_(game)Another paper and pencil game? Not at all.


view pic.






We would like to underline that we build a Platform, a System, that's gonna bring a SPECIAL experience.


The paragraph for poetry:
We feel we make a genetic experiment. We cross two creatures - poker and GO (Dots forerunner) - to give a birth to monster. Or superhero.
Dots game  reflects the way the contemporary society lives. It's perfect both for consuming on the way as well as for building long lasting experience from colorful kaleidoscope pieces of glass.




System
At the first stage we will develop the following “chapters”: 


view pic.1. The Challenge (one on one single games) 
2. The Way (the multilevel system of unlimited number of games with similar to poker Ring Games (or cash tables) feeling) 
3. The Tourneys (a huge system of online tournaments with all “poker” factors like time, limits, rebuys etc. It's an exciting competition, which can make you a rich guy - another Cinderella) 
4. The Sandpit (one on one single games with no points or money factor. Just playing for fun or practicing)

Andrei aka Andron Mandroje. One word - creator. Many words here.
Ruslan aka Unknown. One word - not enough. Guru. Superstar of programming. More about him.

story:
The Contractors is an immersive, grand-scale role-playing game set in a war-torn future of super-soldiers, giant mechs, and vanishing humanity.

Because of its size, we’re developing the game in stages. For this fund goal, we are focusing on:

Finalized creation of 3D character model: Nyla

Character | Nyla

Final concept art for for Nyla

What We Will Achieve In This Phase

To tackle such a big project, we’re adopting an old strategy: “How do you take down a hydra? One head at a time.” We’re applying this approach to our funding, where we’ll be breaking up the games funding and development into discrete, deliverable milestones.

For this stage of funding, we’ll be focusing on creating finalized game-ready character 3D model for Nyla. As you can see from the concept art above, it is a very complex model to build and we will be working with only the best 3d modelers to realize such detail.

In addition, we’ll be creating a simple “whitebox” test environment, in which you’ll be able to play as some of our characters, with some of our weapons. Backers even at the lowest tier will receive this test environment as a playable executable file (.exe).

Our Vision

Think about the games you love and what you love most about them.

Is it driving around a huge cityscape in a sweet ride of your choosing, whether it’s got four wheels or spinning blades, chasing glory while sunset eases in the night?

Is it the adrenaline rush of raining gunfire as you tactically take out waves of enemy soldiers with a kick-ass arsenal of weapons you’ve level grinding to obtain?

Is it mastering the skills and upgrades of your multi-class character as you send them through an epic, seamless, and reactive story?

Well, we love all those things, too. That’s why we want to fuse together all the best parts of all our favorite games and make something awesome – and we want to bring you in on it. We understand that’s an ambitious goal. We’re an ambitious people. But we’re also being realistic about it.

Building something like this is going to take time, a clear and flexible plan, and lots of hard work. So, we’re planning to get the engine running one phase at a time.

We’re hoping you’ll join us while we realise our dream game. It’s still early days, but if you stick with us, your ideas can become a reality too.

The Story

In The Contractors, the world has advanced through unimaginable technological marvels in the game of war. So much so, that our drives of greed and ambition ran unencumbered by limitation and consumed the world like a wildfire. Now we are spared one thing: desperation.

We’ve come full circle. It’s a dog-eat-dog world but instead of claws and fangs, we have guns loaded with more ammo than there are human lives left.

The cities are hollow. Our armies draw strength from living steel. In some measures, machines are the dominant species of the world’s ravaged ecosystem, and the masters they answer to are ones who will never stop fighting.

Because, after all, isn’t there always something to fight for?

Gameplay

A lot of what we have planned for The Contractors is still being refined and tested, while other aspects are still being designed. What we can share for sure now is our design goals:

Open-world exploration

 Seamless storyline with interwoven missions

Gorgeously rendered environments

 Third- and first-person interchangeable POV

Elegant, world-appropriate interfaces

Want some more details? Here are some features we have planned:

Powered mech-suits

Drivable vehicles to explore with

RPG-style experience leveling

Real-time encounters of waves of enemies in the open world (no transitions here!)

Gun fights with elements of cover-based combat

 Item loot drops and a robust inventory system

Customisable weapon upgrades

Technology

CRYENGINE offers us a great system for rendering, lighting, animation, and particle effects,.

With the amazing, purpose built real-time environment, we can create a beautiful open world realizing triple AAA graphics.

Why Crowdfunding

Getting to this point in pre-production hasn’t been easy. As an indie developer, I personally have tapped into my own funds to create the initial concept art and models, as well as devote my time to work on building this game. To date, it’s been 3 years – and there’s been no inkling to slow down. To continue with building this game, we need some support. The funds which you, our beloved backers, generate will be used to fund the creation of high-end assets made by some very talented artists – and they don’t come cheap. That’s why we need you.

Rewards and Perks

One of the unique aspects of our crowdfunding efforts is including any potential backer into the development process. Have you ever wanted to design a weapon or vehicle, and then see it fully realised in a game? Well this is your chance!

For a limited number of backers at certain reward tiers, we’re offering a chance to work together with our art team to design a custom exclusive skin for a weapon, vehicle, or character (whichever you choose) which will then be posted in our game store.

We’ve made this opportunity exclusive to some of the higher-end reward tiers. Please see our reward perks for more details.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you can contribute as a backer or not, you can always help by sharing the game with people you know. So please don’t hesitate to spread the word if you want to see the game get made! Any of our promotional art or videos – anything at all – are free to be shared on social media, forums, or what-have-you.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Dear Patrons,

We at Voyager Electronics Studio are proud to be a truly international company. An experienced team of friends from all over the world (Australia, US, Germany, Canada, Hungary, Serbia, France and Ukraine) share the same vision of creating innovative, unique and complex massive multiplayer online experiences. We’ve known each other for a very long time, and finally, we decided to focus our burning desire and bring our creativity to the light of day. However, a game without future players’ participation in the process of creation isn’t a good game. EMP is a game which is made by players who are cyberpunk and Sci Fi genre admirers. Fans suggest, vote and create the game from the very beginning. Also, a very important part of our team consists of our patrons, and we use this opportunity to thank them from the bottom of our hearts! Finally, two questions you will all want to ask are: Is EMP mmo going to be free to play, and when can we expect the game to be completed? 

Yes, we are happy to officially announce that EMP mmo will be, when finished, a free-to-play game, and what we are aiming at this moment is an alpha version (exclusively for our Patrons), which will not happen before late 2015. However, there will be a lot of surprises in 2014, such as different independent playable modules, and we will keep you informed regularly about news from Voyager Electronics Studio.

We are all aware that we have a very tough task, but we are so determined to achieve our goal that nothing can stop us.
Have faith in the EMP mmo team, help us in our quest and be assured that we will give the best from ourselves. What we can promise is that we will never disappoint you!

Why do we need $30,000 for a motion capture system?

Motion capture offers several advantages over traditional computer animation of a 3D model. More rapid, even real time results can be obtained. This can reduce the costs of keyframe-based animation.The amount of work does not vary with the complexity or length of the performance to the same degree as when using traditional techniques. This allows many tests to be done with different styles or deliveries, giving a different personality only limited by the talent of the actor.Complex movement and realistic physical interactions such as secondary motions, weight and exchange of forces can be easily recreated in a physically accurate manner.The amount of animation data that can be produced within a given time is extremely large when compared to traditional animation techniques.This contributes to both cost effectiveness and meeting production deadlines.

To conclude:

When we succeed in this crowdfunding task, we will save a lot in future expenses and significantly speed up EMP game release.

Dear Patrons,

EMP comic is a special gift for your commitment. Unique storylines, dozens of characters and hundreds of different locations in this comic will help you to better understand the world of Hermes 6.

A new issue of EMP comic will be available every three months, and only you have exclusive rights to become proud owners of a whole collection, digital or printed.

Mr. Tiberiu Beka, our lead comic artist, is working hard in the studio, and we are all excited to see the new EMP comic issue.

As an early backer, you’ll be
getting a lot more than just the finished game.

You’ll be part of a limited number of Patrons that has exclusive access to early gameplay and unique items.

HACKER apartment with "Breacher Mk1" fixed configuration computer console – your own place and starting equipment in Metroplex One, created by world-famous concept artist Alex Drummond.

LUXURY APARTMENT with terrace swimming pool and "Super Stormer Mk1" modular configuration computer console, created by famous concept artist Igor Vitkovsky.

And of course-HOVERBIKES to fly around the Metroplex One and play with style!

The first armour set that you can obtain at the beginning of the game.

Note: You will have an option to upgrade your patron program in the future, but only if there are unused patron slots in a wanted patron program!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please, spread the word out and make some noise about EMP mmo campaign!
  • Also, try to use the Indiegogo Facebook and Twitter share tools!

For more information about EMP project and VES team, please visit our website:

www.empmmo.com

We know for sure, there is huge enthusiasm in all of you. Lets show now to the whole world real power of crowdfunding.

From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for your support!

 

Let's recap patron programs:

www.empmmo.com

story_txt: a

story:
“Ghost Encounters: Deadwood - The Collector’s Edition” is an exciting, casual adventure game where you play the role of an extraordinary paranormal detective who has an uncanny ability to see beyond the normal world and communicate with lost souls. You will travel to the ghost town of Deadwood where the spirit of the infamous outlaw Blackjack has been unleashed and he is killing off the townsfolk. Your paranormal talents will be required to communicate with his past victims and uncover the mysteries of Deadwood before more innocent lives are lost.


“Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” was originally released for the PC. Since then we have decided to remaster the game with an entirely new game engine allowing for faster performance, more special effects, and the ability to make mobile versions. But this is not a typical port to new platforms. We have gone back and reworked numerous areas of the game to make it an even better gameplay experience. We are adding:

  • New game content and puzzles
  • Improved cinematics and special effects
  • Additional story elements
  • Introducing a new main character
  • Recording voice overs throughout
  • Adding a new hint system
  • Numerous other gameplay enhancements

“Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” is a casual adventure game that includes over a dozen types of minigames and puzzles, including some hidden object games. The core gameplay mechanic of this new “Collector’s Edition” of the game is adventuring. We love old school adventure games, but casual adventure games are also a lot of fun and open the adventuring genre up to a wider audience. So rest assured that there is plenty adventuring to be had in the town of Deadwood!

“Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” will be available for a wide variety of platforms and devices including:

  • PC
  • Mac
  • iOS (iPad & iPhone)
  • Android (Phones & Tablets)
  • Kindle Fire
  • Nook HD


Additionally, “Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” will be available in the following languages:

  • English
  • German
  • French
  • Italian
  • Dutch
  • Japanese
  • Korean

The good news is we do not require additional funds to complete this game, but have brought this project to you to help it succeed once complete. We are a very small indie developer who has mostly relied on publishers through the years to promote our games. Recently we have begun to branch out and start to distribute some of our games directly to the players. As you are probably aware, this is not an easy task. Finding an audience for our games is always the biggest challenge. We don’t have a marketing team, let alone a marketing budget. So we thought crowd funding would be a great way to work directly with players and help us get the word out about “Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” and Anarchy Enterprises.

In addition, there are some things that can be done via crowd funding that frankly would be hard to replicate through most other distribution models. The ability to bring the players into the development fold as well as the type of rewards we can offer makes for a unique development experience.

First off thank you for taking the time to check out our crowd funding project. Anarchy Enterprises has been developing independent games for over a dozen years. Our first retail game Moon Tycoon came out way back in 2001, but we have not yet crowd-sourced a project. We are extremely excited to be able to work more closely with you – the people who actually play our games!

Sometimes game development feels like working behind closed doors. When working with a publisher, us developers can get isolated from the people that are most important to the game development process – the players. Game developers tend to have to deal with publishers, distributors, hardware techs, lawyers, corporate middlemen and a myriad of others that will never end up playing and enjoying the games that are being created. Anarchy Enterprises has always been a small, indie studio that would like to stay directly connected with game players, and now we have a tremendous opportunity via crowd funding to make that relationship even closer

(Please note: the graphics below are only representations of the rewards and may not reflect the final products)

  • Special Thanks from Anarchy Enterprises
  • Full version of the game on your choice of platform (PC, Mac, iOS, or Android)
  • Exclusive Digital Wallpaper
  • Digital Strategy Guide (PDF)
  • Name in the Credits: “Supporter”

  • All of the above plus:
  • Full Version of the game on as many platforms as you want (PC, Mac, iOS, and Android)
  • Exclusive Digital Poster (PDF)
  • Digital Version of the Map of Deadwood (PDF)
  • Choice of one other Anarchy game.
  • Name in the Credits: “Detective”

  • All of the above plus:
  • Making of “Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” Book (PDF)
  • The Journal of a Paranormal Detective (PDF)
  • Deadwood Wanted poster with your name and likeness on it (PDF)
  • Name in the Credits: “Bounty Hunter”

 

  • All of the above plus:
  • Have your likeness appear somewhere in the game. This could include on a wanted poster, a framed picture, a newspaper, or a gravestone, to name a few places. Show your friends that you are in a game!
  • Name in the Credits: “Deputy”

  • All of the above plus:
  • Become one of the ghost characters in the game that players must interact with! We will use your likeness to create one of the ghost characters in the game. Everyone who plays the game will have to interact with you and you will be forever immortalized in the game!
  • Name in the Credits: “Sheriff”

We sincerely appreciate the time you have taken to read about our crowd funding project. We hope that if you have made it this far we’ve grabbed your attention enough to make you want to be part of the process. The making of Ghost Encounters: Deadwood will be an amazing experience for everyone involved and we hope that you will join us.

We love old school adventure games, but casual adventure games are also a lot of fun and open the adventuring genre up to a wider audience. So rest assured that there is plenty adventuring to be had in the town of Deadwood!

“Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” will be available for a wide variety of platforms and devices including:

PC
Mac
iOS (iPad & iPhone)
Android (Phones & Tablets)
Kindle Fire
Nook HD

Additionally, “Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” will be available in the following languages:

English
German
French
Italian
Dutch
Japanese
Korean



The good news is we do not require additional funds to complete this game, but have brought this project to you to help it succeed once complete. We are a very small indie developer who has mostly relied on publishers through the years to promote our games. Recently we have begun to branch out and start to distribute some of our games directly to the players. As you are probably aware, this is not an easy task. Finding an audience for our games is always the biggest challenge. We don’t have a marketing team, let alone a marketing budget. So we thought crowd funding would be a great way to work directly with players and help us get the word out about “Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” and Anarchy Enterprises.
In addition, there are some things that can be done via crowd funding that frankly would be hard to replicate through most other distribution models. The ability to bring the players into the development fold as well as the type of rewards we can offer makes for a unique development experience.


First off thank you for taking the time to check out our crowd funding project. Anarchy Enterprises has been developing independent games for over a dozen years. Our first retail game Moon Tycoon came out way back in 2001, but we have not yet crowd-sourced a project. We are extremely excited to be able to work more closely with you – the people who actually play our games!
Sometimes game development feels like working behind closed doors. When working with a publisher, us developers can get isolated from the people that are most important to the game development process – the players. Game developers tend to have to deal with publishers, distributors, hardware techs, lawyers, corporate middlemen and a myriad of others that will never end up playing and enjoying the games that are being created. Anarchy Enterprises has always been a small, indie studio that would like to stay directly connected with game players, and now we have a tremendous opportunity via crowd funding to make that relationship even closer



(Please note: the graphics below are only representations of the rewards and may not reflect the final products)


Special Thanks from Anarchy Enterprises
Full version of the game on your choice of platform (PC, Mac, iOS, or Android)
Exclusive Digital Wallpaper
Digital Strategy Guide (PDF)
Name in the Credits: “Supporter”




All of the above plus:
Full Version of the game on as many platforms as you want (PC, Mac, iOS, and Android)
Exclusive Digital Poster (PDF)
Digital Version of the Map of Deadwood (PDF)
Choice of one other Anarchy game.
Name in the Credits: “Detective”




All of the above plus:
Making of “Ghost Encounters: Deadwood” Book (PDF)
The Journal of a Paranormal Detective (PDF)
Deadwood Wanted poster with your name and likeness on it (PDF)
Name in the Credits: “Bounty Hunter”



 

All of the above plus:
Have your likeness appear somewhere in the game. This could include on a wanted poster, a framed picture, a newspaper, or a gravestone, to name a few places. Show your friends that you are in a game!
Name in the Credits: “Deputy”




All of the above plus:
Become one of the ghost characters in the game that players must interact with! We will use your likeness to create one of the ghost characters in the game. Everyone who plays the game will have to interact with you and you will be forever immortalized in the game!
Name in the Credits: “Sheriff”



We sincerely appreciate the time you have taken to read about our crowd funding project. We hope that if you have made it this far we’ve grabbed your attention enough to make you want to be part of the process. The making of Ghost Encounters: Deadwood will be an amazing experience for everyone involved and we hope that you will join us.

story: All funds will be used to gain control of Monsanto Co. (NYE) and wind it down until it's no longer viable as a business entity. End of story.

story:
I'm a geek that just happens to be paralyzed from the shoulders down. I miss playing video games more than I could ever convey in words. Please help me raise the funds to buy a QuadStuick (A video game controller for quadriplegics), the mounting system for it, a PlayStation 3, and a few games so I can play video games again. 

 

Here are the links to what I'm asking for so you can see the prices for yourself: 

 

QuadStick controller $399

 

http://www.quadstick.com/shop/quadstick-game-co...

 

 

Magic Arm Mounting Kit $229

 

http://www.quadstick.com/shop/magic-arm-mountin...

 

PS3 $220

 

http://www.bestbuy.com/site/sony-playstation-3-...

 

The extra money i'm asking for is for a few games, taxes, shipping and handling, and other service fees. 

 

Thank you for your help!

story:
WE ARE RUNNING A SECOND CAMPAIGN.

PLEASE HEAD OVER TO OUR KICKSTARTER. 


CLICK HERE NOW 


SUMOBOYTHEGAME.COM

Follow us on social media too:

facebook.com/sumoboythegame
twitter.com/@Taprr_
instagram.com/taprr











Sumoboy is the first ever comic styled JRPG adventure influenced by the nobel and ancient combat Art of Sumo.

iOS / Android  / PC / Mac / Linux

Update 12 - THE LEGEND OF SUMOBOY #7 “A Prison Built for One”                       

Want more? Next Instalment is #8

Pervious Episodes: Click here to read 

A downtrodden young hero must rise, conquering his own fears and doubts to take up a magical sword, rescue a Princess and vanquish the malevolent forces that oppose him.

That sounds like the basic plot to scores of popular films, books, comics and video games, doesn’t it? Well, THE LEGEND OF SUMOBOY is that and yet it will be so much more. We at Taprr intend to re-invent what one would expect in a traditional JRPG by taking a cue from modern day poetry, comics and video games in terms of story and gameplay. We don’t want to be tied to a stringent, retro and/or homage sensibility – we want to transcend sensibility to make something truly cool and original!

Update

 Jerry Bonner: Game Story/Scenario Writer.

Today we welcome true talent to portray the Legend of Sumoboy.

A renowned professional writer with over 15 years experience. Working on a variety of mediums including comics, video game scripting and journalism. Jerry’s passionate story telling ability will take you upon an empowering, fantasy driven journey to convey a unique tale that breaths new light into the JRPG genre.

Writing Credits: Marvel Comics, Wizards of the Coast, Gentleman’s Quarterly (GQ), IGN, Electronic Gaming Monthly (EGM), Ars Technica, 1UP, What They Play, GamePro, Indie Game Chick, Imagine Publications (NOW Gamer, X360, Play tm and Retro Gamer) Gameranx, GameFront, Geeks of Doom and others.

Game Script Credits: TYNON (PC); Lucky (Xbox, Android and iOS); Investigate This: The Scourge of the Scarecrow (Xbox, iOS), Ride to Hell (Xbox, PS3 and PC), Pirate Legends (iOS)

Update

We are thrilled and excited to let you know we now have a well respected game industry veteran working with us on 'SUMOBOY' the unique comic inspired JRPG. We are not at liberty to reveal names just yet, however we can state we have an international award winning developer who has previously been involved in the development of game titles for industry leaders such as EA Games and Square Enix. 

First Release: Sumoboy 

  • Platform: iOS | Android
  • Game type: JRPG - 3D Isometric
  • Mode: Combat
  • Release: Jan 2014
  • Goal: 40K

Second Release: Sumoboy 

  • Platform: PC | Mac | Linux (possibly via steam and our website)
  • Game type: JRPG - 3D Isometric
  • Mode: Exploration and Combat (pending stretch goals)
  • Release: Jul 2014
  • Goals: 100K+

I am Chris Laurent. What can I say; I love gaming, technology and live for creativity.

My friends and I are creating a game inspired by Anti Bullying. The first ever Rikishi influenced JRPG to focus on the Art of Sumo and mixed combat. The story is set in imaginary old japan and is based on a chubby boy and a journey in self-discovery.

This unique JRPG cleverly and unobtrusively infuses Anti-Bullying into a compelling story line. Sumoboy's interesting and unexpected emotional behavior through out game play demonstrates this powerful message.

Below you will find information on this independent game project, and how you can help if you want to help us bring it to life.

 

Now let me ask you? Have you ever had an idea for a game, but never able to get it out into the world? Well, like many, I have. I’ve had mine since I was 7. 

The idea was sparked by a playground encounter back in Grade 2, and ever since, I've been plotting revenge in the form of creative arcade action animation!

The year is 1985, and I am being pushed around in front of my classroom. These pushes quickly turn to punches and kicks, and I find myself knocked down to the pavement.

As a 7-year-old, my first thought was 'Darn, I wish I knew Kung Fu'

I am sure most would agree. At some point in every kid’s life, we've all wanted the strength and ability of a skilled warrior such as a Kung Fu master for one reason or another. 

A couple of years later, I sketched my first drawing of an unnamed character and with that, it began a life-long dream to create an underdog fighting game experience. 

Fast forward to today, it all started with the recreation of the original drawing of the character I did all those years ago. When I finished sketching, I realised he looked more like a Sumo boy.

Finally after eight years in digital, we can turn this ambitious kid’s story into an epic adventure!


SumoBoy has no one and nothing; he’s a chubby orphan who is almost constantly picked on, put down and over-looked. He has no real home or identity. He has no idea who his parents are or where he comes from.

What’s an unfortunate child like this to do? Why, just make it all up, of course!

While SumoBoy’s real/external life is dull, drab and somewhat meaningless, his interior life, the life he lives in his mind, is rich and adventurous. It is this internal life that keeps him sane and in a (relatively) good humor. Most children born into these ill-fated circumstances would be bitter, unruly miscreants, but not SumoBoy. He remains polite and studious because, ultimately, he believes that what he has made up in his head is real and if he isn’t a good boy, his mother won’t come to claim him one day; to remove him from the awful Tohoku Home for Boys where he is bullied and beaten on a daily basis.

Of course, the “origin” that SumoBoy has concocted for himself is rather epic. His parents aren’t just “Joe the Truck Driver” and “Linda the Waitress” who live in a small apartment in the city and have normal, everyday problems. In SumoBoy’s mind, his father is a famous Sumo wrestler known as “Otokoyama  (男山)” or “The Man Mountain” and his mother, Kesa, is truly “Yoso no Ojo (要素の王女)The Princess of the Elements” disguised in human form here on Earth. Her father was chosen to be her protector/bodyguard because of his physical, wrestling prowess and enormous girth. And, as these things go (or as SumoBoy willed them to go because it’s his fantasy after all), Yama and Kesa fell in love and had a child, Oji (SumoBoy’s true name).

Now, why would The Princess of the Elements be hiding out in the real world and need a protector? Good questions. The answers are simple: the comely Princess had another suitor of course, a guileful being known as Kurai Kami. The Princess spurned Kuari Kami’s advances because she sensed that he was a truly malignant and repulsive creature. Kurai Kami is not one to be rebuffed, so he pursued her throughout time and to the very ends of existence…until she had no choice but to disguise herself as a simple human being, hide amongst them and hope that Kurai Kami would forget her.

Kuari Kami is also one not to forget…especially someone who has escaped his nefarious grasp. It took some doing, but Kurai Kami eventually found the Princess, hiding in plain sight on Earth. A plan was hatched: Kurai Kami would possess Yama’s main Sumo rival, D. Toyota, granting him extraordinary powers for their bout. He would “accidentally” slay Yama in the ring and then make off with the near defenseless Princess. Unfortunately for the infant SumoBoy/Oji this vile plot worked to perfection and left him an orphan.

Now that he is older and able to fight, SumoBoy has been receiving mental/dream messages from his mother, the captive Princess. He must find the courage within him; he must channel the fighting spirit of his father and release her from under Kurai Kami’s evil thumb.  SumoBoy must release the Four Elements of the Earth (wind, water, fire and earth) from the control of Kurai Kami to fully restore his mother’s power and then they can face Kurai Kami together.

Fortunately, it is still within Kesa’s power to send her son two “gifts” to aid him in the coming battle with Kurai Kami: the wizened old Master, Kodai, and the Ainohane to Nikushimi (愛の羽根と憎しみ), The Blade of Love and Hate. In reality Kodai is just the janitor at the orphanage, but SumoBoy has co-opted him into his fantasy because Kodai is nice to him.

WHAT HAPPENS NEXT! TO BE CONTINUED... Keep your eye's on our comic updates to see what happens next! Mondays, Wednesday & Saturdays here EXCLUSIVE on Indiegogo.

Produced by Taprr, a small passionate independent app and now, game studio. We promise to capitulate the true essence of youthful courage -- the kind that lives deep within the sole of every person that has ever been made to feel less than good enough.


We have been working hard on Sumoboy for 12 months. From sketches to renders and framing to animation takes hundreds of hours. The 2D animation is finally complete and we are frenetically working on the 3D assets. We plan to begin iOS development first off, before moving towards Android, PC, Mac and Linux.

We've happily invested a lot of time and money into this project, and we are extremely proud of what we've been able to achieve thus far, but unfortunately, this progress comes at a cost, but hey we are passionate and driven. We've come this far so why not do everything humanly possible to raise the additional funds needed to make Sumoboy’s epic story come to life.

To launch Sumoboy successfully, we need to be able to pay the associated bills. Coding animation and multiple platform development is an expensive and massive effort, which we want to make sure is done right. To do that, we are looking for help from backers. 

That's where you come in. With your help, together we can break through walls and push Sumoboy over the line. Support will get the first game live on iPhone, iPad and Android well before the end of the year as we push towards PC and Mac and Linux with our stretch goals.

Be part of Sumoboy history, help us reach our goal and turn this small unheard of indie game into a household name.

We love games that take us to far away places, however just like you. We live in the real world and don't expect something for nothing, so we have lined up heaps of awesome original memorabilia to reward you for your kind donations. You can check out what’s on offer down the right hand side of this page.

Go on make a donation now, we know you want to. :)


To be honest, there is a ton of work that goes into an ambitious vision such as a game –  a lot more than we initially thought. Fortunately, we have extensive knowledge in application development and the skills in gaming and mobile to turn this creative project into a finished reality. 

Here's a glimpse of what funding will go towards:

Game Design, User Experience, Animation, Game Programming/Coding, Story Production, Illustrated 2D and 3D Rendering/Rigging, Level Design, Production Management, Element Wire Framing, Sound Effects, Voice Artist, System Architecture, Systems Administration, De-bugging, QA and well, a lot more.

Funding from this Indiegogo campaign is none-profit and will go directly towards fuelling the bills related to the above production components.


I can tell you, we would be over the moon just to reach our target goal. However if we raise more, here are the awesome stretch goals to look forward to! 

 

 

 

SECOND GAME 3D - JRPG: This will move us away from just a PC demo game as we begin developing all levels with in Sumoboy's realm.  It allows us to enhance the game play experience through the implementation of more VFX and generate bigger battle options. 

 


SECOND GAME 3D - JRPG: This stretch goal will give us the wings to launch the second instalment in planing on playable on PC. Game play styling inspired by cult hits like Diablo III and Bastion.

 

Now we are talking. Firstly PC, MAC AND LINUX! All possibly via Steam so you can play Sumoboy on the major 3. Take Sumoboy through an epic comic inspired mystified 3D adventure to save the elements of earth.

We want you to play an active role in the development of this cult master piece.

 

Really?! Did someone say... more game play options? Battle Mode and Exploration Mode! Exploration allows you to execute mini quests to progress through story based objectives.

250K+ Plus: We have our eyes set on other platforms such as, Nintendo Wii U, Xbox Live Arcade/Indie/One, Play Station 3,4,Vita and even those new guys, OUYA and Gampop. You tell us what you want!

Note: We will add extended detail to these stretch goals as we get closer to each bench mark.

THE FIRST EVER SUMO BASED JRPG!

Sumoboy is the first full scale action JRPG adventure to originate from the nobel combat Art of Sumo. Sumoboy embarks on a journey to save the Princess of Elements to protect Nature from The Darkness and his evil Zombie Army.

Game play is intuitive with the seamless exploration and combat models bringing the characters and environment to life in carefully thought out scenarios. Carefully blending emotional and psychical highlights and ensure an interesting dynamic progression of this story.

Your objective is to restore the land by aligning the Elements of Earth, bring the Princess home and rid the land of evil. To achieve this, you must help Sumoboy develop his skills through out game play and advance to connect the four elements of earth. This JRPG is unique, fast and jam-packed with heaps Sumo of Kung Fu moves. Master mixed combos like the Sonic Sumo Stomp, Death Belly Bounce and all your mixed Kung Fu favourites. 

The game has been designed to emulate an imaginary ancient Japan which is demonstrated with lush environment art works, inspired by game design techniques from 80s. 

Game play revolves around the four elements of earth. It is believed to reflect the simplest essential parts and principles of which anything on earth consists. It's an ancient belief inspired by the natural observation of phases of matter. Collect and align all four and draw upon the natures power to unleash four awesome and unique Powerups.

The gamer must collect these elements at crucial moments during the game to restore nature and use them at the right stages to defeat The Darkness.


IF YOU HAVE COME THIS FAR THAN WE ARE SURE YOU WOULD LOVE TO PLAY THIS GAME AND MORE GAMES LIKE IT.

PLEASE PLEDGE A DONATION AND PLAY YOUR PART IN MAKING SUMOBOY HISTORY :)

FAQ

Q. Are Pledgers in AUD or USD?

A: We are Australian based however it's in US dollars. Indiegogo dosen't have an AU dollar option for the time being.

Q. Would love to help but I only have a few bucks?

A: Sure a that's is fine. Just pledge what you can afford. We appericate every little dollar. Don't forget sharing this campaign via social. It's another form of support so please share this page when ever you can :)

Q: Is the game free or paid?

A: The iOS & Android version of the game will be FREE with in-app purchase options. The MAC and PC game will be a paid game, however if you pledge over $25 or more here on Indiegogo you will receive Codes to download the game.

Q. How long until I get my perks?

A: As soon as this campaign is finished we will begin the process of putting all the perks together. This could take us 4 to 8 weeks after the campaign end date. Please note that we are shipping some shirts from Australia so allow an additional 10 to 20 days.

We take perks seriously so we have appointed a decicated Perks Manager to make sure everything gets to you as quickly as possible. We will be reading your comments, so leave messages there at will.

Q. How do I tell you my t-shirt size?

A: You can add infomation when you make pledge to this campaign. You will also have a chance to give us additional information at the end of the campaign. If by chance you missed something, don't worry, we will contact you. You can also leave t-shirt sizes or any other additional information in the comments area.

Q. What if I left out the shipping costs by mistake?

A. You can make an additional donation with the missing amount required for your perk. Just notify us through the comments area.

Q. How long until a comment is responded to?

Please allow our Perks Manager 24 to 48 hours to respond. All comments are being tracked and we are also keeping a check list. We record everything so don't worry if you're comment no longer appears, deleting them makes it easier for us to track progress.

Q. Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?

A. Yes. Just pledge again with the difference.

Example paid $55+ shipping on first pledge & wanted to upgrade to $85 offer

Easy. Just pledge and additional $30. Leave a comment so we match it up faster.

power to send her son two “gifts” to aid him in the coming battle with Kurai
Kami: the wizened old Master, Kodai,
and the Ainohane to Nikushimi (愛の羽根と憎しみ), The Blade of Love and Hate. In reality
Kodai is just the janitor at the orphanage, but SumoBoy has co-opted him into
his fantasy because Kodai is nice to him.
WHAT HAPPENS NEXT! TO BE CONTINUED... Keep your eye's on our comic updates to see what happens next! Mondays, Wednesday & Saturdays here EXCLUSIVE on Indiegogo.

Produced by Taprr, a small passionate independent app and now, game studio. We promise to capitulate the true essence of youthful courage -- the kind that lives deep within the sole of every person that has ever been made to feel less than good enough.





We have been working hard on Sumoboy for 12 months. From sketches to renders and framing to animation takes hundreds of hours. The 2D animation is finally complete and we are frenetically working on the 3D assets. We plan to begin iOS development first off, before moving towards Android, PC, Mac and Linux.
We've happily invested a lot of time and money into this project, and we are extremely proud of what we've been able to achieve thus far, but unfortunately, this progress comes at a cost, but hey we are passionate and driven. We've come this far so why not do everything humanly possible to raise the additional funds needed to make Sumoboy’s epic story come to life.
To launch Sumoboy successfully, we need to be able to pay the associated bills. Coding animation and multiple platform development is an expensive and massive effort, which we want to make sure is done right. To do that, we are looking for help from backers. 
That's where you come in. With your help, together we can break through walls and push Sumoboy over the line. Support will get the first game live on iPhone, iPad and Android well before the end of the year as we push towards PC and Mac and Linux with our stretch goals.
Be part of Sumoboy history, help us reach our goal and turn this small unheard of indie game into a household name.
We love games that take us to far away places, however just like you. We live in the real world and don't expect something for nothing, so we have lined up heaps of awesome original memorabilia to reward you for your kind donations. You can check out what’s on offer down the right hand side of this page.
Go on make a donation now, we know you want to. :)







To be honest, there is a ton of work that goes into an ambitious vision such as a game –  a lot more than we initially thought. Fortunately, we have extensive knowledge in application development and the skills in gaming and mobile to turn this creative project into a finished reality. 
Here's a glimpse of what funding will go towards:
Game Design, User Experience, Animation, Game Programming/Coding, Story Production, Illustrated 2D and 3D Rendering/Rigging, Level Design, Production Management, Element Wire Framing, Sound Effects, Voice Artist, System Architecture, Systems Administration, De-bugging, QA and well, a lot more.
Funding from this Indiegogo campaign is none-profit and will go directly towards fuelling the bills related to the above production components.







I can tell you, we would be over the moon just to reach our target goal. However if we raise more, here are the awesome stretch goals to look forward to! 

 
 
 
SECOND GAME 3D - JRPG: This will move us away from just a PC demo game as we begin developing all levels with in Sumoboy's realm.  It allows us to enhance the game play experience through the implementation of more VFX and generate bigger battle options. 


 

SECOND GAME 3D - JRPG: This stretch goal will give us the wings to launch the second instalment in planing on playable on PC. Game play styling inspired by cult hits like Diablo III and Bastion.








 
Now we are talking. Firstly PC, MAC AND LINUX! All possibly via Steam so you can play Sumoboy on the major 3. Take Sumoboy through an epic comic inspired mystified 3D adventure to save the elements of earth.
We want you to play an active role in the development of this cult master piece.





 
Really?! Did someone say... more game play options? Battle Mode and Exploration Mode! Exploration allows you to execute mini quests to progress through story based objectives.
250K+ Plus: We have our eyes set on other platforms such as, Nintendo Wii U, Xbox Live Arcade/Indie/One, Play Station 3,4,Vita and even those new guys, OUYA and Gampop. You tell us what you want!
Note: We will add extended detail to these stretch goals as we get closer to each bench mark.

THE FIRST EVER SUMO BASED JRPG!
Sumoboy is the first full scale action JRPG adventure to originate from the nobel combat Art of Sumo. Sumoboy embarks on a journey to save the Princess of Elements to protect Nature from The Darkness and his evil Zombie Army.
Game play is intuitive with the seamless exploration and combat models bringing the characters and environment to life in carefully thought out scenarios. Carefully blending emotional and psychical highlights and ensure an interesting dynamic progression of this story.
Your objective is to restore the land by aligning the Elements of Earth, bring the Princess home and rid the land of evil. To achieve this, you must help Sumoboy develop his skills through out game play and advance to connect the four elements of earth. This JRPG is unique, fast and jam-packed with heaps Sumo of Kung Fu moves. Master mixed combos like the Sonic Sumo Stomp, Death Belly Bounce and all your mixed Kung Fu favourites. 
The game has been designed to emulate an imaginary ancient Japan which is demonstrated with lush environment art works, inspired by game design techniques from 80s. 
Game play revolves around the four elements of earth. It is believed to reflect the simplest essential parts and principles of which anything on earth consists. It's an ancient belief inspired by the natural observation of phases of matter. Collect and align all four and draw upon the natures power to unleash four awesome and unique Powerups.

The gamer must collect these elements at crucial moments during the game to restore nature and use them at the right stages to defeat The Darkness.














IF YOU HAVE COME THIS FAR THAN WE ARE SURE YOU WOULD LOVE TO PLAY THIS GAME AND MORE GAMES LIKE IT.
PLEASE PLEDGE A DONATION AND PLAY YOUR PART IN MAKING SUMOBOY HISTORY :)


FAQ
Q. Are Pledgers in AUD or USD?
A: We are Australian based however it's in US dollars. Indiegogo dosen't have an AU dollar option for the time being.
Q. Would love to help but I only have a few bucks?
A: Sure a that's is fine. Just pledge what you can afford. We appericate every little dollar. Don't forget sharing this campaign via social. It's another form of support so please share this page when ever you can :)
Q: Is the game free or paid?
A: The iOS & Android version of the game will be FREE with in-app purchase options. The MAC and PC game will be a paid game, however if you pledge over $25 or more here on Indiegogo you will receive Codes to download the game.
Q. How long until I get my perks?
A: As soon as this campaign is finished we will begin the process of putting all the perks together. This could take us 4 to 8 weeks after the campaign end date. Please note that we are shipping some shirts from Australia so allow an additional 10 to 20 days.
We take perks seriously so we have appointed a decicated Perks Manager to make sure everything gets to you as quickly as possible. We will be reading your comments, so leave messages there at will.
Q. How do I tell you my t-shirt size?
A: You can add infomation when you make pledge to this campaign. You will also have a chance to give us additional information at the end of the campaign. If by chance you missed something, don't worry, we will contact you. You can also leave t-shirt sizes or any other additional information in the comments area.
Q. What if I left out the shipping costs by mistake?
A. You can make an additional donation with the missing amount required for your perk. Just notify us through the comments area.
Q. How long until a comment is responded to?
Please allow our Perks Manager 24 to 48 hours to respond. All comments are being tracked and we are also keeping a check list. We record everything so don't worry if you're comment no longer appears, deleting them makes it easier for us to track progress.
Q. Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?
A. Yes. Just pledge again with the difference.
Example paid $55+ shipping on first pledge & wanted to upgrade to $85 offer
Easy. Just pledge and additional $30. Leave a comment so we match it up faster.

story:
If you got here after the campaign finished, you can still support Enola by buying the game in its current alpha  form here for $9.99. By buying Enola in alpha, you get instant access to the current and future alpha builds, as well as the beta versions, and a DRM-Free digital copy of the game when it's finished.

UPDATE 2: The first alpha is out. Watch the video in the "updates" section to know more about this first alpha.

 

UPDATE 1: I updated the Ludum Dare entry, adding a few things, to make this small game prototype. This prototype features 1 puzzle, 1 "trap-puzzle" and two really simple endings. The prototype is obviously very rough but I want to show you something closer to my vision for the full Enola game. The full game will feature a larger forest, 5 realms (levels), 4 secret "trap levels," a final level that changes according to your actions in these previous levels, and different endings. For Enola I want to focus on a different kind of fear, not the kind of fear you experience in games with monsters, demons, or bloody walls. Enola will explore how scary the actual human nature can be.

 

NOTE ABOUT ALPHA BUILDS DELIVERY: I'm using BMTMicro as a way to send the alpha builds to backers. Please keep that in mind, since you'll be getting emails from BMTMicro titled "Enola product information" every time I send the alphas.

 

 

A brief background...

I am Sergio, an indie developer from El Salvador. Last December I made "Enola" (approximate pronuntiation "nwola") a small game for the 48 hour ludum dare game development competition, and I'd love to take the game to a new level, and deliver a full interactive experience. The 48 hour game that I made is mostly an exploration game, but for the full version of Enola I want to make what I'd define as "horror/adventure," as it will combine puzzles and unnerving situations in a twisted world.

 

 

 

You're a nameless solitary character (maybe a person?), completely lost and with no previous knowledge of anything, and you have to figure out where you are and what to do based on the clues and pieces of information you get. Enola takes place in this weird twisted world, and there's a reason for this other than being a "visual style." Maybe this place is an alien planet, another dimension, or a dream. You don't know for sure, but you have to find out. Everything in Enola's story and setting is open to the players' interpretation.

 

Some of my inspirations for this game are Myst, Silent Hill, The Blair Witch Project, Red Dragon, and Marble Hornets on Youtube. Visually, I was greatly inspired by the video game Limbo. By looking at these sources of inspiration, you can probably guess the kind of game I want Enola to be.

 

You can check Enola, the game I made for the ludum dare 22 competition here.

 

 

What I Need...

Since I'm not this talented person that can take on all aspects of making a game by himself, I'm asking for your support because I'll need the help from others to make a game into a really cool experience. This would include designers, artists, and (I hope) audio specialists as well, so you can experience Enola not just with your eyes but with your ears as well. As you can see, I need enough backing so I can turn Enola into a full game that everyone can play and enjoy.

 

The money would also be used to acquire a Mac (used or new, doesn't matter), and iDevices to test and port Enola to iOS, since the simple look-and-point control scheme would fit touch screens perfectly, and also to get a spot in different gaming events, like PAX, GDC, and such, so I'll be able to show the game to as many people as possible, live.

 

 

 

You Can Help!

You can help us by making a donation, and you'll also get some nice items (from a copy of the game to the full source code). On the other hand, you can also help by telling others about this campaign. Please share the link to this page with as many people as you can, post it on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, blogs, and anything else!

 

To know more about Enola, follow this link. You can also follow me on Twitter @TheDomaginarium and @magnolia_fan for updates on Enola and other things..
